NK038(nyi)004:1: // ye shes lha'i bsnyen bsgrub dang 'jig rten dregs pa'i bzhi rim las sbyor rnams bzhugs so //
NK038(nyi)004:2: dpal mi pham he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK038(nyi)004:3: ye shes lha yi bsnyen pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:4: bsgrub sngags dang las sbyor bzlog sngags dang /
NK038(nyi)004:5: 'jig rten dregs pa'i bsnyen pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:6: bsgrub pa chen po'i las sbyor gyis sngags kyi rim pa 'di yin no //
NK038(nyi)004:7: ye shes lha yi bsnyen pa ni /
NK038(nyi)004:8: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang /
NK038(nyi)004:9: rdo rje yi ni las bzhi /
NK038(nyi)004:10: ru lu ru lu h'u phata b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:11: ru lu phyi yi bzlas pa ni /
NK038(nyi)004:12: thugs ka'i h'u gi 'od zer las //
NK038(nyi)004:13: ru lu ru lu 'bru brgyad spros //
NK038(nyi)004:14: phyi snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang //
NK038(nyi)004:15: nang bcud kyi 'jig rten 'bar ba lnga bcu brgyad //
NK038(nyi)004:16: kun kyang ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing //
NK038(nyi)004:17: ru lu'i gsung sgra di ri ri //
NK038(nyi)004:18: phar 'phros pa ni thugs dam bskongs //
NK038(nyi)004:19: tshur 'dus pas ni dngos grub stsol //
NK038(nyi)004:20: ru lu'i 'dren stangs rnams gnyis las //
NK038(nyi)004:21: ni ye shes lnga nyid de //
NK038(nyi)004:22: ru lu gong ma khro mo brgyad //
NK038(nyi)004:23: ru lu 'og ma phra men brgyad //
NK038(nyi)004:24: h'u ni khrag 'thung yab yum bcu //
NK038(nyi)004:25: phata ni ye shes sgo ma bzhi //
NK038(nyi)004:26: b+h+yo ni dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad //
NK038(nyi)004:27: ru lu ru lu h'u phata b+h+yo //
NK038(nyi)004:28: ru lu ging gi mchod par bzhes //
NK038(nyi)004:30: bsgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol //
NK038(nyi)004:31: sdang ba'i dgra la rtags chen phyung //
NK038(nyi)004:32: gnod pa'i bgegs chen rdul du rlog /
NK038(nyi)004:33: ru lu'i 'dren stangs thabs cig las //
NK038(nyi)004:34: ru lu thugs kyi dkyil na 'dren //
NK038(nyi)004:35: tsit+ta rin chen gzhal yas khang //
NK038(nyi)004:36: ye shes sems dpa' yab yum la //
NK038(nyi)004:37: don gyi lha mo lnga ru bskor //
NK038(nyi)004:38: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas //
NK038(nyi)004:39: nyi dkyil rdo rje h'u ldan las //
NK038(nyi)004:40: ru lu ru lu 'bru brgyad bskor //
NK038(nyi)004:41: phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskongs //
NK038(nyi)004:42: tshur 'dus pas ni dngos grub stsol //
NK038(nyi)004:43: ru lu ru lu h'u phata b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:44: ru lu ru lu 'dren stangs rnam gcig la //
NK038(nyi)004:45: ru lu ljags kyi dkyil nas 'dren //
NK038(nyi)004:47: rdo rje de ni zla tshes bsgom //
NK038(nyi)004:48: rdo rje zla tshes ra bar du //
NK038(nyi)004:49: ru lu ru lu 'bru brgyad bsgom //
NK038(nyi)004:50: phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskangs //
NK038(nyi)004:51: tshur 'dus pas ni dngos grub stsol //
NK038(nyi)004:52: ru lu 'dren stang rnam cig la //
NK038(nyi)004:53: ru lu'i sgra yi bye brag ston //
NK038(nyi)004:54: dkar po spros pas bde ba che //
NK038(nyi)004:55: dmar po spros pas yongs la khyab //
NK038(nyi)004:56: dkar dmar mtshams nas he ru ka /
NK038(nyi)004:57: khro chen 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas //
NK038(nyi)004:58: khro chung zhal gsum phyag drug spros //
NK038(nyi)004:59: khro bo sprul pas sa gzhi khebs //
NK038(nyi)004:60: khro mo'i sprul pas nam mkha' khengs //
NK038(nyi)004:61: ma mo mkha' 'gro dbyings na rol //
NK038(nyi)004:62: kun kyang ru lu sgra sgrogs shing //
NK038(nyi)004:63: ru lu'i gsung sgra di ri ri //
NK038(nyi)004:64: ru lu ru lu h'u phata b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:65: ru lu h'u gi mchod par bzhes //
NK038(nyi)004:66: dkyil 'khor 'di la bsgrub pa po la bsnyen pa thabs kyi man ngag go //
NK038(nyi)004:67: ru lu nang gi bzlas pa ni /
NK038(nyi)004:69: gnyis med ye shes bskyed pa'i gzhal yas su //
NK038(nyi)004:70: lnga bcu rtsa brgyad khro bo'i skur gsal bas //
NK038(nyi)004:71: kun kyang ru lu h'u gi sgra sgrogs shing //
NK038(nyi)004:72: ru lu'i gsung sgra di ri ri //
NK038(nyi)004:73: ru lu h'u gi mchod pa bzhes //
NK038(nyi)004:74: dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa sdang ba'i dgra la rtags chen phyung //
NK038(nyi)004:75: gnod pa'i bgegs chen rdul du rlog /
NK038(nyi)004:76: ru lu ru lu h'u phata b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:77: ru lu nang gi bzlas pa ni //
NK038(nyi)004:78: nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i man ngag go //
NK038(nyi)004:79: ru lu gsang ba'i bzlas pa ni //
NK038(nyi)004:80: yab kyi thugs kyi h'u nyid las //
NK038(nyi)004:81: yum gyi thugs kyi h'u la thim //
NK038(nyi)004:82: yum gyi gsang ba'i lam nas byung //
NK038(nyi)004:83: thugs kar thim nas dngos grub stsol /
NK038(nyi)004:85: ru lu yab yum mkha' nas 'dres //
NK038(nyi)004:86: yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje dang //
NK038(nyi)004:87: yum gyi pad+ma gzhal yas su //
NK038(nyi)004:88: ru lu ru lu 'bru brgyad bsgom //
NK038(nyi)004:89: phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskongs //
NK038(nyi)004:90: tshur 'dus pas ni dngos grub stsol //
NK038(nyi)004:91: ru lu gsang ba'i bzlas pa ste //
NK038(nyi)004:92: bsgrub pa nyid dang 'brel ba yi //
NK038(nyi)004:93: ru lu rdo rje bzlas pa ste //
NK038(nyi)004:94: dbugs dang 'grogs pa'i sgom pa ste //
NK038(nyi)004:95: h'u gis phul bas phyir phyung dang //
NK038(nyi)004:96: gyis drangs nas nang du rngubs //
NK038(nyi)004:97: a las sems gtad gnas pa gsum //
NK038(nyi)004:98: zhag gcig la ni dbugs rgyu ba //
NK038(nyi)004:99: nyi khri chig stong zlas pa ste //
NK038(nyi)004:100: sngags ni nyi khri chig stong 'gyur /
NK038(nyi)004:102: bcom ldan khrag 'thung thugs kyi dpal be'u las //
NK038(nyi)004:103: ye shes sku mchog mtshon gang rin po che //
NK038(nyi)004:105: byang chub sems ni spro zhing bsdu //
NK038(nyi)004:106: ru lu rdo rje zlas pa ste //
NK038(nyi)004:108: gzhan yang bsgrub chen las rnams ni //
NK038(nyi)004:109: ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru /
NK038(nyi)004:110: lha srin dbang bsdud dam la btags //
NK038(nyi)004:111: ru lu ru lu 'bru brgyad sngags //
NK038(nyi)004:112: rngam pa'i nga ros zlas pa yin //
NK038(nyi)004:113: lha srin sde brgyad dbang du bsdud //
NK038(nyi)004:114: bsgrub pa chen po zhes su gsungs //
NK038(nyi)004:115: las la sbyor ba'i rim pa ni //
NK038(nyi)004:116: bdag nyid chas su bzhugs pa dang //
NK038(nyi)004:117: khro chen rngam pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:118: las la sbyor ba'i drag sngags bzlas //
NK038(nyi)004:119: ru lu ru lu h'u phata b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:120: sarba sha trum ma ra ya phata /
NK038(nyi)004:121: sngags kyi las la sbyor ba'o //
NK038(nyi)004:122: gser skyems btang zhing bden pa brdar //
NK038(nyi)004:123: phud gtor ma nyes gzu dpang gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:126: ru lu ru lu h'u phata b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:127: che ge mo a kar+sha ya h'u dza dzah dmigs bya 'gugs pa'i gsang sngags te //
NK038(nyi)004:129: dud chen btang la sngags 'di bzlas //
NK038(nyi)004:130: che ge mo de ba bi de sha ya /
NK038(nyi)004:131: de ba pra be sha ya phata /
NK038(nyi)004:133: che ge mo a be sha ya a /
NK038(nyi)004:134: dmigs bya stim pa'i drag sngags so //
NK038(nyi)004:135: phur bus gdab cing thun gyis brab //
NK038(nyi)004:136: mtshon gyis gtub cing zhal du rngub //
NK038(nyi)004:137: nye ba'i bsnyen pa bsgrub pa dang //
NK038(nyi)004:138: bsgrub pa chen po las sbyor rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:139: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya //
NK038(nyi)004:140: ye shes lha yi bsnyen sgrub rnam par phye ba'i man ngag rdzogs so //
NK038(nyi)004:141: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK038(nyi)004:142: spyir bzlas pa la gnyis te /
NK038(nyi)004:146: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:148: rdo rje bzlas pa la'ang gnyis te /
NK038(nyi)004:150: de kho na nyid kyi bzlas pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:151: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas pa la gsum ste /
NK038(nyi)004:155: dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs nas /
NK038(nyi)004:156: bskyed pa ni dgra bo'i rnam par shes pa /
NK038(nyi)004:158: nyon mongs pa'i yid dang bcas pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:159: phung po lhag ma mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la btab ste /
NK038(nyi)004:160: de lta de ni sbyor ba dang ldan pas nyin
NK038(nyi)004:161: lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du tshogs kyi mchod pa
NK038(nyi)004:162: dang / stab pa bya zhing bzlas pa bya ba ni las la sbyar ba'o //
NK038(nyi)004:163: 'jig rten pa'i las la gsum ste /
NK038(nyi)004:167: de la dang po rtags dang /
NK038(nyi)004:169: sa sna bdun gyi 'dag pa la mkhar byas te /
NK038(nyi)004:171: logs bzhi la glo dkar bzhi thod pas mtshan pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:172: ru mtshon chen po bzhi dang dur bya nag po brgyad dang /
NK038(nyi)004:173: steng bya khyung gi phyag rgya gnyis dang /
NK038(nyi)004:174: de'i nang du gru gsum mthing nag gi nang du /
NK038(nyi)004:176: khro bo'i steng du mda' sgro spud /
NK038(nyi)004:177: rnga ma gcig la dug me nag po bcug pa gcig la mgul du dar mthing le'u gcig gdags /
NK038(nyi)004:178: de la dang po ril bu phur ma gcig rten pa'i rdzas /
NK038(nyi)004:179: bar pa khrol bu brab pa'i rdzas /
NK038(nyi)004:180: tha ma phye ma mchod pa'i rdzas /
NK038(nyi)004:181: phur pa ling+ga'i snying khar gtsugs la bzhag go //
NK038(nyi)004:182: bya rgod kyi phod bzhi la /
NK038(nyi)004:183: dar lce bzhi dang bcas te mda' yi steng du btsug la bzhag go //
NK038(nyi)004:184: khro bo'i rdzas kyi za ma tog sman sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang /
NK038(nyi)004:188: ri rab spyi bskor thod bram dang bzhag go //
NK038(nyi)004:189: khro mo'i rdzas su sa tshal gcig gi nang du /
NK038(nyi)004:194: de rnams kyi bkang la bzhag go //
NK038(nyi)004:195: shar phyogs su khro bo'i mkhar byas la /
NK038(nyi)004:196: dmigs bya'i ling ga'i steng du mchog phur gcig la
NK038(nyi)004:197: mkhar nag gam rgyu zhags kyi btags te snying khar
NK038(nyi)004:198: bcug la sbas la bzhag go //
NK038(nyi)004:199: rgyu zhags kyi ri rab spyi bskor gyi dmigs la gdag /
NK038(nyi)004:200: ki la ya nyi shu rtsa gcig sgrol gying du byin gyis brlabs la sbas la bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:201: lho phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi mkhar du /
NK038(nyi)004:202: ling+gi steng du mdung dmar po ba dan dang bcas te bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:203: g.yas su ra zor dang g.yon du mda' zor bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:204: nub phyogs srin po'i ma khar du /
NK038(nyi)004:205: ling ga'i steng du sbrul mgo gdengs ka gsum pa bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:206: g.yas su sha sna deb rtse gang bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:207: g.yon du klu sman sna tshogs deb rtse gang bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:209: byang phyogs su ma mo'i mkhar du ling ga'i steng du dar mthing gi gur dbub /
NK038(nyi)004:210: mthun rdzas sna tshogs b+han+d+ha gang bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:211: dgra bo lha dang dbral ba'i phyir /
NK038(nyi)004:212: rgya tshil la sogs pa'ang bsham /
NK038(nyi)004:213: de nas khro bo zhal bcas la mkhar gyi nang du mda' la skyon ste /
NK038(nyi)004:214: rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid la kha bstan la bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:215: de nas bsnyen bsgrub tshul bzhin bya /
NK038(nyi)004:216: de nas las la sbyor ba'i dus su /
NK038(nyi)004:221: de nas drag po'i drag sngags bzlas pa'i dus su
NK038(nyi)004:222: bdag dpal chen po'i thugs ka nas las kyi mgon
NK038(nyi)004:223: po gsal shing can zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gcer
NK038(nyi)004:224: bu ral pa gyen du bardzesa pa /
NK038(nyi)004:225: sku mdog sngo nag phyag g.yas na gsal shing nag po g.yon na zangs gri nag po bsnams pa /
NK038(nyi)004:226: cig rtsar gyi ston la bzhi po'i mgon po dang /
NK038(nyi)004:227: gnyis su med par byas te /
NK038(nyi)004:228: bdag dpal chen po la ci bgyi zhes bka' nyan par bsam mo //
NK038(nyi)004:229: rnal 'byor nyid kyi brda bstan pas /
NK038(nyi)004:231: lce spyang dmar por sprul te /
NK038(nyi)004:232: lha sbyin gyi sna na yar bzhugs nang khrol zhal du rngubs te /
NK038(nyi)004:233: don snying smad lnga spar gyis btab nas slar phyung ste /
NK038(nyi)004:234: dpal chen po la bstab par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:235: de ltar de'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
NK038(nyi)004:236: nyin mtshan dus drug tu bstab pa'i las bya zhing drag po'i sngags gdon par bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:237: de nas mtshan ma rtags la phebs pa dang //
NK038(nyi)004:238: rnal 'byor bdag gi tho mtshams su phyin la rgya tshil gyi dud pa btang /
NK038(nyi)004:239: lha dang dbral ba'i cho ga bya /
NK038(nyi)004:240: slar bzlog ste phur pas gdab pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:244: de nas gdab pa'i las bya /
NK038(nyi)004:246: de nas mnan pa'i las bya ste /
NK038(nyi)004:247: sbyin bsreg byas pa'i thal ba la ling+ga bya ste
NK038(nyi)004:248: ming byang snying khar bcug la tsakra kha sbyor gyi
NK038(nyi)004:250: mkhar nag gi rgyu zhags kyis bsdam la /
NK038(nyi)004:251: mnan pa'i sar khyer la phur pa zhi sa bdag gi 'bros su bcad la /
NK038(nyi)004:252: de nas gser skyems btang la /
NK038(nyi)004:253: yul gyi lha 'dre la ma nyes pa'i dpang gzugs /
NK038(nyi)004:254: sa bdag la klu sman sna tshogs kyi mchod pa sbyin /
NK038(nyi)004:255: de nas mnan pa'i sa brus te gru gsum khru do sa bru'o //
NK038(nyi)004:256: de nang rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa'i klu bdud ma chen po kha phye zhig /
NK038(nyi)004:257: rgyas pa'i dgra bo 'di gtad kyis byas la /
NK038(nyi)004:259: de'i steng du mgon po mi'u thung gi gzugs skyon /
NK038(nyi)004:260: de steng du khro bo'i khar bya khyung dang phyag
NK038(nyi)004:261: rgya bcas pa bzhag de steng du g.yam pa nag
NK038(nyi)004:262: po la rdo rje rgya gram gyis rgyas btab la
NK038(nyi)004:263: kha bcad do // dpa' bo'i bro brdung ste de
NK038(nyi)004:264: nas gom pa nyer gcig phyir bskyed la zor brdeg
NK038(nyi)004:265: kha bcad do // / log na spogs pa'i las bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:266: g.yas su log na rkang pa g.yas la lan gsum bskor la 'phang /
NK038(nyi)004:268: g.yon du log na yang rkang pa g.yon pa la lan gsum bskor la 'phang /
NK038(nyi)004:270: thad dkar log na 'dug sar tho gcig btsugs la phar tshur rdeg /
NK038(nyi)004:271: de nas log ste gnas su phyin la /
NK038(nyi)004:272: drag po'i sngags mgo 'jug ldog la stong tsho gcig 'don /
NK038(nyi)004:273: de nas zor gyi las bya /
NK038(nyi)004:274: de nas gtang rag gi gtor mas ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol /
NK038(nyi)004:275: dam tshig gi lha lus la bsdu /
NK038(nyi)004:276: mtshams mi dmigs pa rang bzhin gyis grol /
NK038(nyi)004:277: de ltar byas nas las la sbyar ba'o //
NK038(nyi)004:278: de ltar byas nas kyang lo ru thogs nas phyi rtags med na mnan pa'i lta /
NK038(nyi)004:279: phar nas 'dug na slar la mnan pa'i las bya /
NK038(nyi)004:280: ma 'phar na lha gnad la dbab pa'i las byas te /
NK038(nyi)004:281: mgon po'i gzugs tho gang pa byas te /
NK038(nyi)004:282: ru lu'i sngags spyi bor bris /
NK038(nyi)004:283: bsnyen pa nye ba'i bsnyen pa /
NK038(nyi)004:284: rkang pa g.yas nas lag pa g.yas pa'i bar du gzhog g.yas pa la bri /
NK038(nyi)004:285: bsgrub pa dang bsgrub pa chen po'i sngags rkang pa
NK038(nyi)004:286: g.yon pa nas lag pa g.yon pa'i bar gzhogs g.yon
NK038(nyi)004:287: pa la bri / gzhi snying cig tu dril la 'doms su bri /
NK038(nyi)004:288: yig mgo nang du bstan no //
NK038(nyi)004:289: de nas bdag dpal chen po'i 'og tu gzir mnan bya /
NK038(nyi)004:290: tha ma 'byung po nyin zhags gcig la zangs gri nag pos btubs la /
NK038(nyi)004:291: drag pos me sbar la sbyin bsreg bya /
NK038(nyi)004:292: de nas thal ba mgon po'i gzugs bya /
NK038(nyi)004:294: bsnyen bsgrub kyi sngags la a mri ta btags te bdud rtsi gtor ma gso ba'o //
NK038(nyi)004:295: skrag dang gzi mdangs dang ldan par bsam mo //
NK038(nyi)004:296: de nas las sbyor yang yang bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:297: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'jig go //
NK038(nyi)004:298: snod ngan rnam la ma spel cig /
NK038(nyi)004:300: bsad pa dur khrod nag po bdud du bsgrub ste /
NK038(nyi)004:301: dgra bo nyams pa bsad pa'i man ngag kho na'o //
NK038(nyi)004:303: dbang du 'dus na las la sbyar /
NK038(nyi)004:304: las la 'gro ba'i rtags byung ba dang /
NK038(nyi)004:306: tha ma mnan bsregs 'phangs pa'i las gsum bya /
NK038(nyi)004:307: 'gyangs na 'khor lo spogs pa'i las bya ste 'grub bo ///
NK038(nyi)004:308: mgon po legs ldan gyi phrin las dang bskul pa bzhugs so ///
NK038(nyi)004:309: bcom ldan 'das sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po shin
NK038(nyi)004:310: tu rnam par grol ba 'jigs byed he ru ka
NK038(nyi)004:311: phyag 'tshal lo // rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal nas /
NK038(nyi)004:312: nyid kyi bka' bzhin las byed pa'i /
NK038(nyi)004:313: lha chen mgon po nag po ni /
NK038(nyi)004:314: mnyes par byed phyir gtor ma yi cho ga'i lag len rgyud ltar bri /
NK038(nyi)004:315: de la thog mar rang gis yi dam gyi lha'i mngon par rtogs pa rgyas bsdus gang rung gi //
NK038(nyi)004:317: 'dzab bsnyen yan chod sngon du btang ba'i rjes su
NK038(nyi)004:318: mgon po'i gtor ma nang ltar du byin gyis rlabs
NK038(nyi)004:319: te / dam tshig pa rnams bskyed pa ni /
NK038(nyi)004:320: bam ri ma la ya lam khrag gi rgya mtsho /
NK038(nyi)004:321: b+h+r+aum s+pha thod pa mkhar ra na phata /
NK038(nyi)004:323: b+h+r+aum ka pa la b+hi sha man+da la b+h+aum n+ri dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan ti sti ra bam /
NK038(nyi)004:326: dam las rab mi s+pha ra na phata /
NK038(nyi)004:328: bur ku ma h+aa k+aa la kro ta h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:329: yak+sha kro ti sho ri trag po he /
NK038(nyi)004:330: h'u ya dza la ham phata b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:331: kro ta dz+wa la sa ma ya /
NK038(nyi)004:332: yak+sha dz+wa la sa ma ya /
NK038(nyi)004:333: tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya /
NK038(nyi)004:334: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha /
NK038(nyi)004:336: he he he he he he he he /
NK038(nyi)004:342: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:343: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:344: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:345: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:349: badz+ra sa ma ya h'u dza /
NK038(nyi)004:351: lang+ga yul gyi grong brdal gyi //
NK038(nyi)004:352: dbus kyi ri bo ma la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:353: ko ka thang dmar rgya mtsho'i do //
NK038(nyi)004:355: drag shul can gyi rtse mo na /
NK038(nyi)004:356: rdo rje thabs kyi blta ba'i yul //
NK038(nyi)004:357: chos mdzad rigs kyi bsgrub gnas de //
NK038(nyi)004:358: dpal chen rdo rje srin po yis //
NK038(nyi)004:359: bdud kyi rigs rnams btul nas kyang //
NK038(nyi)004:360: gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshe //
NK038(nyi)004:361: ming gi dbang bskur bran du khas blangs pas //
NK038(nyi)004:362: rdo rje ro langs tshogs kyi bdag /
NK038(nyi)004:363: mgon po nag po chen po dang //
NK038(nyi)004:364: nye gnas kro ti shwa ri ma //
NK038(nyi)004:365: yab yum gnyis su med pa'i 'khor //
NK038(nyi)004:366: lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa'i //
NK038(nyi)004:368: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
NK038(nyi)004:370: b+hur kum ma h+aa k+aa la rak+sha kro ti shwa
NK038(nyi)004:371: ri nag mo ting lam e a ra li hrim
NK038(nyi)004:372: hrim dza dzah rak+sha sh+ri he ru ka b+hi sha
NK038(nyi)004:373: badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la man+da la phata phata phata
NK038(nyi)004:374: ha la ha la h'u mgrin pa dpral ba phata
NK038(nyi)004:379: badz+ra yak+sha kro ta bzhi ha ha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi h'u h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:380: sa ma yah ma h+aa su ka h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:381: pra be gnam du bstan pa sha ya /
NK038(nyi)004:382: badz+ra a bdud rtsi dbang bskur ba mri ta ma h+aa kro ta am am /
NK038(nyi)004:383: b+h+yo a ri b+h+yo dza dzah h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:387: lto bar bde bar bstan pa /
NK038(nyi)004:391: snams su ston pa thugs rje chung //
NK038(nyi)004:392: da yang ci mdzad myur du mdzod //
NK038(nyi)004:393: myur du bsgral na yun du bde //
NK038(nyi)004:395: 'bangs la nan tan ma chung cig /
NK038(nyi)004:396: slan chad dam bcas bzhin bka' bzhin rjes su bgyid //
NK038(nyi)004:397: gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis na //
NK038(nyi)004:398: dam pa'i lung dang 'gal gyur na //
NK038(nyi)004:399: bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying //
NK038(nyi)004:400: rul myags tshig nas skam gyur cig /
NK038(nyi)004:401: i mna' bor ba dan de na ra kan //
NK038(nyi)004:403: na ma b+ha ti tish+tha nan //
NK038(nyi)004:404: sa ma ya raka sha si //
NK038(nyi)004:405: si ti bi na badz+ra a mri ta kro ta na ra kan //
NK038(nyi)004:406: ma sring bu mo chung ma rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:409: kha las dgyes pa tham kha tham sbyar bar mdzad pa //
NK038(nyi)004:411: dbus su mchis skal mi ldan gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:413: phud la 'tshal skal mi ldan gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:414: lhag ma zhal chab bran la gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:415: nye gnas dung gi ma sring rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:416: deng nas rgyal ba'i bka' yin gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:417: khyed kun nga yi las mkhan te //
NK038(nyi)004:418: baka yi las rnams phyung myur du bsgrubs //
NK038(nyi)004:419: bdag dang sngon log par spyad pa'i mthus //
NK038(nyi)004:420: dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal brgyud //
NK038(nyi)004:421: da ni las 'phros thugs rje nyid dang 'phrad pas /
NK038(nyi)004:422: bde ba can gyi zhing du myur 'gro yis //
NK038(nyi)004:423: 'khor la nus dras gdams pa'i tshul gyis rang nyams bshad pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:424: rjes su bstan pa'i bka' las nyams pa ste //
NK038(nyi)004:425: ji ltar ma byams bu la gdung ba bzhin //
NK038(nyi)004:426: dam tshig can la dung dung gdung bar bgyi //
NK038(nyi)004:427: gang zhig sring byams ming la gdung ba bzhin //
NK038(nyi)004:428: yal 'dab can la lhang lhang brtse bar bgyi //
NK038(nyi)004:429: mdza' mo grogs la ji ltar gdung tshul du //
NK038(nyi)004:430: rnal 'byor can la bkril bkril nye bar bgyi //
NK038(nyi)004:431: ji ltar g.yog byams dpon la brtse ba ltar //
NK038(nyi)004:432: dam pa rnams ni yid bzhin nor ltar khur //
NK038(nyi)004:433: brtse bar byed na ma ru bya //
NK038(nyi)004:434: gdung bar byed na sring du bya //
NK038(nyi)004:435: brtson par byed na bran du bya //
NK038(nyi)004:436: rigs rgyud 'dzin na bu ru bya 'du 'bral med
NK038(nyi)004:437: na slob mar bya bskul bar dpal gyi zhal bzhes
NK038(nyi)004:438: pa'o mgyogs na pho nyar bya bka' bzhin byed na
NK038(nyi)004:439: bka' la gdags h'u sngoon tshe dpal chen phyi nang
NK038(nyi)004:440: gsang ba'i mtshan nas 'bod khro bo'i rgyal bdud 'dul
NK038(nyi)004:441: rdo rje srin po yis dregs pa bcom nas sgrib
NK038(nyi)004:442: pa sbyangs dbang bskur ming rtags srog snying phul pho
NK038(nyi)004:443: brang kun la dam tshig byin phyi yis mtshan nas
NK038(nyi)004:444: bos pa'i tshe mgon po legs ldan nag po bzhengs
NK038(nyi)004:445: nang gi mtshan nas bos pa'i tshe bdud 'dul dur
NK038(nyi)004:446: khrod sgrol ba'i gying gsang ba'i mtshan nas bos pa'i
NK038(nyi)004:447: tshe rdo rje sgrol byed drag po rtsal mna' bor
NK038(nyi)004:448: khas blangs ma bsnyel bar sku gsung thugs su bdag
NK038(nyi)004:449: sbyor bas pho brang dkyil 'khor mnga' bdag 'dir rtag
NK038(nyi)004:450: tu dam tshig tshul bzhin gyis +aahmh'u /
NK038(nyi)004:452: h'u dang po bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas pa'i
NK038(nyi)004:453: bdud 'dul dbang phyug ma h+aa ka la'i tshogs srin
NK038(nyi)004:454: yul lang ka pu rangs kyis grong khyer bstan nas
NK038(nyi)004:455: brlag mdzad cing lha ma yin gyi bu mo ni
NK038(nyi)004:456: glog sprin 'dul bar zhal bzhes pa'i rak+sha sh+r+ai he
NK038(nyi)004:458: bka' bzhin byed dam dam la gdags ces pa'i bar
NK038(nyi)004:459: ni 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor skabs su mi
NK038(nyi)004:460: dgos te / sngon byung rjes 'jug 'di la mi 'jug ces pa'i don no //
NK038(nyi)004:461: h'u sngon tshe dpal chen khro rgyal ces pa nas //
NK038(nyi)004:462: +aahmh'u badz+ra sa ma ya h'u gi bar //
NK038(nyi)004:463: bka' sdod pho nya'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs 'dir mi dgos /
NK038(nyi)004:464: 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bya ste //
NK038(nyi)004:465: phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshan nas 'bod ces pa'i don no //
NK038(nyi)004:466: lha chen mgon po nag po khyod dur khrod gnas
NK038(nyi)004:467: 'dir bzhugs nas kyang bdag gi bcol pa'i phrin las
NK038(nyi)004:468: mdzod sa ma ya s+t+wam lcang lo can gyi b+han+d+ha
NK038(nyi)004:469: ru byang chub sems dang mam sa rak+ta dang dri
NK038(nyi)004:470: chen ku ku'i chu ste rnam pa lnga gnyis med
NK038(nyi)004:471: sbyar ba'i pany+tsa a mri ta nag po chen po
NK038(nyi)004:472: 'khor dang bcas la 'bul b+hur kur ma h+aa ka
NK038(nyi)004:473: la rak+sha kro d+hi shwa ri ma h+aa pany+tsa a
NK038(nyi)004:474: mri ta kh+aa h+ai ma h+aa ba lim ta /
NK038(nyi)004:477: ma h+aa go ro tsa na /
NK038(nyi)004:483: kro ta dz+wa la sa ma y+aa /
NK038(nyi)004:484: yak+sha dz+wa la sa ma ya /
NK038(nyi)004:485: tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya /
NK038(nyi)004:486: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha h+ai /
NK038(nyi)004:490: sgo ma yum bzhi dbang mo rnams kyi rtsa sngags brjod cing /
NK038(nyi)004:491: a mri ta sogs kyi mchod pa 'agre'o //
NK038(nyi)004:493: rnal 'byor kun gyi dpal mgon mchog /
NK038(nyi)004:494: ma h+aa ka la mthu rtsal can //
NK038(nyi)004:495: bka' thub chen po tshur gson cig /
NK038(nyi)004:496: legs ldan nag po ma rung pa //
NK038(nyi)004:497: sha khrag dmar gyi mchod pa bzhes //
NK038(nyi)004:498: rang gi rgyal srid la gnas te //
NK038(nyi)004:499: khram la btab pa'i dgra bgegs rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:500: rol cig dgongs cig dam tshig gtso //
NK038(nyi)004:501: khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab //
NK038(nyi)004:502: bse byang khram la btab pa yis //
NK038(nyi)004:503: ma dang sring mo chung ma la //
NK038(nyi)004:504: dpa' bo khyod kyi rol bar mdzod //
NK038(nyi)004:505: dam tshig chen pos ma btang zhig /
NK038(nyi)004:506: zhe sdang can gyi bdag po rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:507: sems can kun gyi tshe 'phrog pa //
NK038(nyi)004:508: dgra bo nyams pa srog dang phrol sha dang khrag
NK038(nyi)004:509: la longs spyod kyi gnod sbyin chen po ma rungs
NK038(nyi)004:510: rnams // bse byang khram la btab pa yi gser
NK038(nyi)004:511: dngul dbyig rnams kun long la rang gi 'dod pa'i
NK038(nyi)004:512: rnams // longs spyod kyi // bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor
NK038(nyi)004:513: bdag nyid la yid bzhin lta bu'i dngos grub stsol
NK038(nyi)004:514: rigs ngan rme sha can gyi tshogs ba glang khyi
NK038(nyi)004:515: sha rta sha dang mi sha glang chen la sogs
NK038(nyi)004:516: bzhes sring mo khrag 'thung ma lus kun bsad pa'i
NK038(nyi)004:517: khrag ni dron mo dang bzhes shig dgra bo'i khrag
NK038(nyi)004:518: la 'thung sprul pa'i phra men chen mo rnams thod
NK038(nyi)004:519: rus rkang dang 'bru mar rnams rkang dang a mri
NK038(nyi)004:520: ta sbyar nas rdzu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas bzhes
NK038(nyi)004:521: rigs ngan gdug pa'i bu mo rnams sha chen bshang
NK038(nyi)004:523: dam rdzas 'bar ba 'di bzhes la bdag gi nad
NK038(nyi)004:524: rnams bzlog tu gsol dmigs pa'i dgra la rims nad
NK038(nyi)004:525: 'thong srid pa'i bud med ma rungs khyed bro gar
NK038(nyi)004:526: glu tshig mchod pa bzhes dmig bya 'byon tshul stobs
NK038(nyi)004:527: kyi phrogs shor ba gzhon nu bdud mo'i tshogs rnal
NK038(nyi)004:528: 'byor chen po'i bka' byung gi sngags sgra drag po'i
NK038(nyi)004:529: mchod pa bzhes dgra bo'i phung po rdul du rlog
NK038(nyi)004:530: log bsreg can gyi tshogs rnams nyon yang dag sa
NK038(nyi)004:531: ru kun rig nas che chung las gnyis gang byas
NK038(nyi)004:532: kyang gnyis kyi dbang du mi 'gyur gyis rnal 'byor
NK038(nyi)004:533: nga'i las 'di sgrubs gsang tshig ston pa'i tshogs rnams
NK038(nyi)004:534: nyon gshang gci khrag dang sol khu yis bargya'am stong
NK038(nyi)004:535: du go nas ni ling+ga gcad na sangs rgyas 'jig
NK038(nyi)004:536: dam rdzas mchod pa bzhes su gsol bcol pa'i las
NK038(nyi)004:537: rnams grub par mdzod mnga' bdag chen po ma rung
NK038(nyi)004:538: ba rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa ste khro bo'i
NK038(nyi)004:539: rgyal po gying chen po mnga' bdag bdud kyi rgyal
NK038(nyi)004:540: po bzhengs bstod cing mthun pa'i rdzas 'di 'bul sngon
NK038(nyi)004:541: gyi bskal pa dang po la khas blangs dam bca'
NK038(nyi)004:542: mna' bor ba sngon du rig 'dzin gong mas sgrubs
NK038(nyi)004:543: da lta rnal 'byor mgon du spyon bam ri thod
NK038(nyi)004:544: pa mkhar gyi rtser ru mtshon nag po pu ru
NK038(nyi)004:545: ru mtshon cha mang po char du 'bebs bdud bya
NK038(nyi)004:546: nag po lding zhing 'dzums dur khrod rgyan can mang
NK038(nyi)004:547: po rnams mche gtsig rngam pa'i zhal gdangs nas khro
NK038(nyi)004:548: bo khro mo'i sprul pa 'khrigs srin po srin mo'i
NK038(nyi)004:549: rkan sgra sdebs gnod sbyin pho mo 'brug ltar sgrogs
NK038(nyi)004:550: za byed mang po glog ltar 'gyu so so mos
NK038(nyi)004:551: pa mtha' dad pa'i dam rdzas mchod pa 'di bzhes
NK038(nyi)004:552: la ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod gtso 'khor
NK038(nyi)004:553: gyi sngags brjod pa'i mthar a mri ta sogs kyi
NK038(nyi)004:554: mchod pa rnams gong ltar 'bul lo hoh mgon po
NK038(nyi)004:555: khyed mchod byin rlabs kyis phyogs dang dus ni thams
NK038(nyi)004:556: cad du sems can legs don 'byor pa la bgegs
NK038(nyi)004:557: ni rnam pa kun med shog rta dang ba glang
NK038(nyi)004:558: nor dang 'bru bu tsha pha ma gnyen bshes rnams
NK038(nyi)004:559: dge zhing tshe ring nad med par thams cad 'byor
NK038(nyi)004:560: pa bstan par shog 'gro la nyes med bde gyur
NK038(nyi)004:561: nas nad dang mu ge kun bral shog rgyal po
NK038(nyi)004:562: dge zhing des pa rnams chos kyi rgyal srid skyong
NK038(nyi)004:563: bar shog bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di phyogs
NK038(nyi)004:564: bcu kun tu rgyas pa dang myur du sems can
NK038(nyi)004:565: thams cad kyang chos kyi snod du gyur par shog
NK038(nyi)004:566: dge ba thams cad spyod bsngo zhing mgon po khyed
NK038(nyi)004:567: mchod byin rlabs kyis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa
NK038(nyi)004:568: rnams longs spyod thams cad rnams gnyis rdzogs par smon
NK038(nyi)004:569: bdag cag byang chub thob gyur nas khyod dang mi
NK038(nyi)004:570: 'bral 'grogs par smon de nas 'dzab bskul bya ste
NK038(nyi)004:571: h'u thugs rje'i stobs kyi dgra bcom sku lnga po
NK038(nyi)004:572: sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' yi las mkhan po dpal
NK038(nyi)004:573: mgon ljang sngon drag po gsal shing can khyod kyi
NK038(nyi)004:574: bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir gnas
NK038(nyi)004:575: 'dir bka' yi dam tshig thub par bsrungs sgrub po'i
NK038(nyi)004:576: grogs kyi dgra la rtags chen phyung ru lu ru
NK038(nyi)004:577: lu h'u phata b+h+yoh ces pa dang bur kur ma
NK038(nyi)004:578: h+aa pad+ma / d+he bur tsi bur byi ge bye
NK038(nyi)004:579: ma nas e ho shwa mo kro ta h'u h'u
NK038(nyi)004:581: ces bsnyen pa'i sngags dang b+hu ru ku ru i tsusma kro ta h'u phata /
NK038(nyi)004:582: ces bsgrub sngags dang b+hur ku ti h'u phata /
NK038(nyi)004:583: ces sgrub pa chen po'i sngags dang badz+ra kro ta
NK038(nyi)004:584: dz+wa la sogs pa 'khor gyi bzlas pa'ang bya'o mgon
NK038(nyi)004:585: po'i dkyil 'khor bdun pa 'di bsgrub cing mchod na
NK038(nyi)004:586: dngos grub gnyis thob gyur the tshom med pa yin
NK038(nyi)004:587: de phyir rnal 'byor kun don du dpal mgon cho
NK038(nyi)004:588: ga 'di tsam pas bstan dang de ni rnal 'byor
NK038(nyi)004:589: pa dpal mgon khyed kyi skyong gyur cig kun gyi
NK038(nyi)004:590: byang chub thob par shog dpal mgon po legs ldan
NK038(nyi)004:591: nag po mchod pa'i las rim yid bzhin nor bu
NK038(nyi)004:592: zhes bya ba sh+aakya'i dge bsnyen sh+aakya'i byang chub kyi
NK038(nyi)004:594: +thii h'u drag po sku lnga rgyal ba'i bka' sdod
NK038(nyi)004:595: mchog ye shes lnga ldan rgyal ba rigs lnga'i 'khor
NK038(nyi)004:596: phrin las bdud 'dul dgra bgegs kun gyi gshed gnas
NK038(nyi)004:597: 'dir myur spyon rnal 'byor phrin las mdzod /
NK038(nyi)004:598: mgon po legs ldan nag po'i zor bskul bzhugs so //
NK038(nyi)004:599: ma g.yel ma phang dam can tshogs //
NK038(nyi)004:600: rnal 'byor nga yi rbad pa'i tshe //
NK038(nyi)004:601: lha dmag chen po sprin ltar gtibs //
NK038(nyi)004:603: phyogs phyogs de ni pha ki na //
NK038(nyi)004:604: nyi ma lho nub mtshams shed na //
NK038(nyi)004:605: zhe sdang dug mtsho mer ba'i nang shed na //
NK038(nyi)004:606: bse sgong khra bo'i nang shed na //
NK038(nyi)004:607: lcags mkhar sngon po'i nang shed na //
NK038(nyi)004:608: gnod sbyin zangs thogs rgyal po bzhugs //
NK038(nyi)004:609: de yi yum chen gtum mo ni //
NK038(nyi)004:610: bse gdong zangs mgrin rdzu 'phrul can //
NK038(nyi)004:611: gnyis su med pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
NK038(nyi)004:612: spyan nas me yi phung po 'bar //
NK038(nyi)004:613: mche ba gnam lcags dgu rgyas gtams //
NK038(nyi)004:616: yab yum 'jigs rung dpa' byad can //
NK038(nyi)004:617: sngon kyang zhe sdang las las sprul //
NK038(nyi)004:618: da lta sngags pa'i phrin las mdzad //
NK038(nyi)004:619: zor kyi dmag dpon las la chos //
NK038(nyi)004:620: de gnyis tshogs pa'i byin rlabs las //
NK038(nyi)004:621: zor gyi rgyal mo mched bzhi byung //
NK038(nyi)004:622: srog gi gshed bzhi bskyod re ran //
NK038(nyi)004:623: shar phyogs bse yi gyad po che //
NK038(nyi)004:624: zor gyi rgyal po da spyon cig /
NK038(nyi)004:625: lho phyogs zor gyi rgyal po ni //
NK038(nyi)004:626: gshin rje dregs pa'i yul gshed na //
NK038(nyi)004:627: lha yi rgyal po stag thabs ni //
NK038(nyi)004:628: lcags kyi bse khrab si li li //
NK038(nyi)004:629: lcags kyi mde thung sha ra ra /
NK038(nyi)004:630: lcags kyi mda' gzhu brdungs nas 'phen //
NK038(nyi)004:631: lcags mda' ru skyogs dgra la rgyob /
NK038(nyi)004:632: ya bdud dregs pa'i yul shed na //
NK038(nyi)004:633: bse yi sog mo mgo dgu pa //
NK038(nyi)004:634: bse yi tshems khrab si li li //
NK038(nyi)004:635: khrag gi mde thung sha ra ra //
NK038(nyi)004:636: khrag mda' thog ser dgra la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:637: nyams pa'i snying la ru zor ya //
NK038(nyi)004:638: gnod sbyin dregs pa'i yul shed nas //
NK038(nyi)004:639: bse yi sog po gdong ring pa //
NK038(nyi)004:640: bse yi tshems khrab si li li //
NK038(nyi)004:641: tshems khrag gong mig dug zor 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:642: sbrul gyi gzhu brdungs dug mda' 'phen //
NK038(nyi)004:643: dam nyams srog la ru zor ya //
NK038(nyi)004:644: zor bdag chen po mched bzhi bskyod tsam na //
NK038(nyi)004:645: ri rab rdo phen 'u ru ru /
NK038(nyi)004:646: rgya mtsho zho phrog chi li li //
NK038(nyi)004:647: bse yi spyang mo ngur zhing zugs //
NK038(nyi)004:648: bse yi bya glag lding zhing 'dzums //
NK038(nyi)004:649: lag na srog gi zhags pa thogs //
NK038(nyi)004:650: dam nyams dgra bo'i srog la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:651: byang phyogs za byed ma mo ni //
NK038(nyi)004:652: nag mo dkar mo smug mo'i tshogs //
NK038(nyi)004:653: ma mo'i khrag zor dgra la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:654: slob dpon ro langs de ba dang //
NK038(nyi)004:656: bka' la btags pa'i bka' nyan ma //
NK038(nyi)004:657: dam la btags pa'i dam can ma //
NK038(nyi)004:658: tsha 'gyur bzhi yi dus la bab //
NK038(nyi)004:659: zor gyi las la skyon re ran //
NK038(nyi)004:660: bal yul khungs pa'i 'dre skye bzhi //
NK038(nyi)004:661: zor gyi las la nan ma chung //
NK038(nyi)004:662: bdud mo bzhi yis dus la bab //
NK038(nyi)004:663: zor gyi las la spyod re ran //
NK038(nyi)004:664: bse yis lha mo mched bzhi ni //
NK038(nyi)004:665: zor gyi bsrung mar gshegs su gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:666: zor kha 'di la nan ma chung //
NK038(nyi)004:667: do nub zor gyi las la chos //
NK038(nyi)004:668: shar phyogs khro bo ging gi tshogs //
NK038(nyi)004:669: yungs dkar 'phang ba'i dus la bab //
NK038(nyi)004:670: nub phyogs srin po rngam pa'i tshogs //
NK038(nyi)004:671: thod zor 'phang ba'i dus la bab //
NK038(nyi)004:672: kye ma ming po rdo rje dmag 'dren na //
NK038(nyi)004:673: sring mo rdo rje mtshon thogs shing //
NK038(nyi)004:674: ming po rdo rje g.yul shom na //
NK038(nyi)004:675: sring mo rdo rje dmag sna drongs /
NK038(nyi)004:676: dgra bo'i yul du dmag 'dren na /
NK038(nyi)004:677: dgra lha rgyal mo dmag la 'du /
NK038(nyi)004:678: bdud kyi yul du dmag 'dren na /
NK038(nyi)004:679: dmag gi rgyal mo dmag sna drongs //
NK038(nyi)004:680: mda' zor 'phang ba'i dus la bab //
NK038(nyi)004:681: ru zor thod zor dgra la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:682: steng gi lha yang gzu dang dpang //
NK038(nyi)004:683: 'og gi klu yang gzu dang dpang //
NK038(nyi)004:684: bar gyi btsan yang gzu dang dpang //
NK038(nyi)004:685: lha srin sde brgyad gzu dang dpang //
NK038(nyi)004:686: gzu dang dpang du dkon mchog bzhugs //
NK038(nyi)004:687: zhal lce lha srin yongs kyis chod //
NK038(nyi)004:688: nga yis ma nyes ma thos kyis //
NK038(nyi)004:689: nyes pa'i stabs la sho ra re //
NK038(nyi)004:690: ma nyes stabs la bcad de re //
NK038(nyi)004:692: steng gi lha la zor mi 'phen //
NK038(nyi)004:694: bar gyi btsan la zor mi 'phen //
NK038(nyi)004:695: sa bdag gnyan la zor mi 'phen //
NK038(nyi)004:699: ru zor gnod pa'i bgegs la 'phang //
NK038(nyi)004:700: nyung zor snying gi dkyil du ya //
NK038(nyi)004:701: thod zor bstan gyi dgra la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:702: mda' zor dkar nag mtshams su ya //
NK038(nyi)004:703: zor gyi rgyal po las la chos //
NK038(nyi)004:704: zhes brjod cing rngam pa'i nga ros sngags bzlas shing //
NK038(nyi)004:706: lus gcer bur phyung la 'thab bgros bya //
NK038(nyi)004:708: zor gyi las bya ba'i thabs rdzogs so //
NK038(nyi)004:709: dang po zor byung gang nas byung //
NK038(nyi)004:710: ma tram dang po ji ltar bsgral //
NK038(nyi)004:711: srid pa'i byol bzhi ji ltar bsgral //
NK038(nyi)004:712: dang po ma tram bsgral ba'i tshe //
NK038(nyi)004:713: mgo bo srin po'i phyogs su bstan //
NK038(nyi)004:714: rkang pa 'byung po'i phyogs su brkyang //
NK038(nyi)004:715: lag pa me dang rlung gi phyogs //
NK038(nyi)004:716: sgrol byed ging gis bsgral rtsam na //
NK038(nyi)004:717: ma tram mgo la ra skyogs srid //
NK038(nyi)004:718: sna ni zab zi zangs skyogs srid //
NK038(nyi)004:719: kos lko bse skyogs khra ba srid //
NK038(nyi)004:720: dang po skyogs byung gang nas byung //
NK038(nyi)004:721: ma tram b+han+d+ha'i nang dag tu //
NK038(nyi)004:722: sa sna ke tshe 'tshe bsal te /
NK038(nyi)004:723: gnam sa yongs kyi byin rlabs las //
NK038(nyi)004:724: yan lag bzhi la 'dam bzhi byung //
NK038(nyi)004:725: mchin pa la ni dug zor byung //
NK038(nyi)004:726: snying gi rtsa las khrag zor byung //
NK038(nyi)004:727: ma tram gi ni mkhris pa las //
NK038(nyi)004:728: bdud kyi byol po de na byung //
NK038(nyi)004:729: ma tram gi ni mtsher pa la //
NK038(nyi)004:730: dmu yi byol po de nas byung //
NK038(nyi)004:731: ma tram gi ni srog rtsa las //
NK038(nyi)004:732: srid pa'i byol po dgra la b+h+yo //
NK038(nyi)004:733: srid pa bdun byol dgra la b+h+yo //
NK038(nyi)004:734: chung la srid pa ma mo byol //
NK038(nyi)004:735: tho rangs rgyu ba btsan gyi byol //
NK038(nyi)004:736: nyi ma'i gung la dmu yi byol //
NK038(nyi)004:737: mon yul gting gi snyug ma la //
NK038(nyi)004:738: 'dab chags bzhi yis sgro yis skyon //
NK038(nyi)004:739: gzhu mo mchog dkar mchog yin te //
NK038(nyi)004:740: skyes bu lag pa g.yon gyis blangs //
NK038(nyi)004:741: da ni gsang ba'i zor 'phen na //
NK038(nyi)004:742: zor gyi de ni shul sol cig /
NK038(nyi)004:743: zor gyi de ni lam phye zhig /
NK038(nyi)004:744: shar phyogs rgyal po yul 'khor bsrungs //
NK038(nyi)004:745: rgyal po de ni brjid re che //
NK038(nyi)004:746: blon po de ni bzang la rags //
NK038(nyi)004:747: btsun mo de ni mdzes la snyems //
NK038(nyi)004:748: shar ba de ni dol re snyems //
NK038(nyi)004:749: de la kyang ni zor mi 'phen //
NK038(nyi)004:750: steng gi lha la mi 'phen no //
NK038(nyi)004:752: bar gyi btsan la mi 'phen no //
NK038(nyi)004:753: lus srog bskyed pa'i pha ma la yang mi 'phen no //
NK038(nyi)004:754: steng gi lha yang gzu dang dpang //
NK038(nyi)004:755: 'og gi klu yang gzu dang bar snang btsan yang
NK038(nyi)004:756: gzu dang lho phyogs 'phags skyes po yang nub phyogs
NK038(nyi)004:757: spyan mi bzang yang byang phyogs rnam thos sras kyang
NK038(nyi)004:758: shar phyogs yul 'khor bsrung yang shar phyogs dri za'i
NK038(nyi)004:759: gdon yang zor 'di sdang ba'i dgra la 'phen //
NK038(nyi)004:760: lho phyogs grul bum gdon yang /
NK038(nyi)004:762: nub phyogs chu bdag gdon yang gzu dang dpang sdang ba'i byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdon yang /
NK038(nyi)004:765: gzhu mo rgyud du ma chad cig /
NK038(nyi)004:766: mda' mo ltong du ma chag cig /
NK038(nyi)004:767: shar phyogs khro bo'i sprul pa yis //
NK038(nyi)004:769: shar gyi phyogs kyis dgra bgegs la //
NK038(nyi)004:770: bya rgod mda' yi snying la rgyob /
NK038(nyi)004:771: dung skyong dkar pos snying la rgyob //
NK038(nyi)004:772: rnog mgo can gyi bshan pa gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:773: tri ta mu kha mthu mo che //
NK038(nyi)004:774: sprul pa lug gi mgo can gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:775: dam nyams dgra yi bshan pa gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:776: 'ug pa'i mda' yis snying rtsa tur //
NK038(nyi)004:777: hu lu mu kha mthu mo che //
NK038(nyi)004:778: bse kyang khra bos mgrin par 'chings //
NK038(nyi)004:779: smyo 'bog sha ba'i mgo can gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:780: dam nyams dgra yi bshan pa gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:781: sprul pa bya rog mgo can gyi //
NK038(nyi)004:782: bya rog mda' yi snying la rgyob //
NK038(nyi)004:783: gsod byed kam ka mu kha mthu mo che //
NK038(nyi)004:784: zungs skyogs dmar pos yul khams choms //
NK038(nyi)004:785: sprul pa khrag gi mgo can gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:786: gsod byed khrag mda' dgra la rgyob //
NK038(nyi)004:787: kha kha mu kha mthu mo che //
NK038(nyi)004:788: ru skyogs nag pos yul khams choms //
NK038(nyi)004:789: dang po zhe sdang pha yis bskyed //
NK038(nyi)004:790: de nas 'dod chags ma yi mngal //
NK038(nyi)004:791: de nas dri za'i lte ba'i 'khor //
NK038(nyi)004:792: tha ma nyon mongs lnga yis gzugs //
NK038(nyi)004:793: lnga phung rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir //
NK038(nyi)004:794: srin po'i mda' zor dgra la thun //
NK038(nyi)004:795: khrag mda' dug mda' dgra la thun //
NK038(nyi)004:796: gsal shing nag po dgra la thun //
NK038(nyi)004:797: lta ba'i mig la khrag zor ya //
NK038(nyi)004:798: nyan pa'i rna la khrag zor ya //
NK038(nyi)004:799: nam phyed sna la khrag zor ya //
NK038(nyi)004:800: nyungs zor nag po dgra la rgyob //
NK038(nyi)004:801: gu gul nag pos mal shig cig /
NK038(nyi)004:802: mdze thod rnon pos drag po rgyob //
NK038(nyi)004:803: dug zor nag pos rlag par gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:804: lcags zor nag pos rlag par gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:805: ma mo rdo 'phen mthu mo che //
NK038(nyi)004:806: rdo zor dag gis yul 'khor choms //
NK038(nyi)004:807: snying khrag chod cig tsit+ta ku lu nan //
NK038(nyi)004:808: yan lag 'chings cig shwo na ku //
NK038(nyi)004:809: rnam shes bcos shig tsit+ta kh+aa hi /
NK038(nyi)004:810: gzugs phungs shig cig tu ti bam /
NK038(nyi)004:811: dag rnams nyes shig tsit+ta ram //
NK038(nyi)004:812: dbang po shig cig i tra ni //
NK038(nyi)004:813: badz+ra kro ta dz+wa la ni //
NK038(nyi)004:814: sha trum ma ra ya kam rbad //
NK038(nyi)004:815: ma ma ma sha trum m+aa ra yam kam rbad //
NK038(nyi)004:817: badz+ra kro ta ya ma pra ti dum pa li sha trum m+aa ra ya gzer /
NK038(nyi)004:818: ni la ni la stam+b+ha nan bcangs sbyin rbad pu ni sha trum m+aa ra ya gzer /
NK038(nyi)004:819: nag gur la sha trum m+aa ra ya dza /
NK038(nyi)004:822: yul gyi lha 'dre la ma nyes pas dpangs gzugs /
NK038(nyi)004:823: sa bdag la yang klu sman sna tshogs kyi pu tsa dbul /
NK038(nyi)004:824: de khru do gsum bar bru'o //
NK038(nyi)004:825: de nas rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas //
NK038(nyi)004:826: klu bdud chen po kha phye zhig /
NK038(nyi)004:827: rgyas pa'i dgra bo gtad do byas la kha sbyor du gzhug go //
NK038(nyi)004:828: de steng mgon po mi'u thung gi gzugs skyon //
NK038(nyi)004:829: de'i steng du khro bo'i mkhar la bya khyung ma ru tra dang bcas pas bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:830: de'i steng du g.yam nag gi gcad //
NK038(nyi)004:831: de nas dpa' bo rta bro brdungs //
NK038(nyi)004:832: de nas gom pa nyi shu rtsa gcig phyir bskyed la zor bteg /
NK038(nyi)004:833: log na spogs pa'i las bya //
NK038(nyi)004:834: g.yas su log na lag pa g.yas pa la lan gsum bskor la lan gsum 'phang /
NK038(nyi)004:836: g.yon du log na'ang de ltar bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:837: thad kar log na 'dug sar tho gcig btsugs la phar rten /
NK038(nyi)004:839: da dung log na gnas su phyin la drag po'i sngags mjug klogs su byas la /
NK038(nyi)004:841: de nas zor gyi las bya /
NK038(nyi)004:842: gtang rag gi gtor ma gtang ye shes sems dpa' gshegs /
NK038(nyi)004:844: mtshams rang bzhan gyis mi dmigs par grol /
NK038(nyi)004:846: de ltar byas na lo ru sbyor nas phyis btags med na /
NK038(nyi)004:848: 'phar nas 'dug na slar la mnan ba'i las bya /
NK038(nyi)004:849: ma 'phar nad nang 'khor ba'i las bya ste /
NK038(nyi)004:850: man ngag las shes par bya /
NK038(nyi)004:852: de nas las sbyor dus su 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor bya ste /
NK038(nyi)004:856: de nas drag po'i sngags bzlas pa'i dus su /
NK038(nyi)004:857: bdag dpal chen po'i thugs ka nas las kyi mgon
NK038(nyi)004:858: po zhal gcig phyag gnyis gcer bu ral pa gyen
NK038(nyi)004:859: du bardzesa pa / sku mdog sngo nag g.yas gsal
NK038(nyi)004:860: shing nag po g.yon lcags kyu thogs pa rtsar gyi
NK038(nyi)004:861: du bardzesa pa / bton nas / bzhi mgon dang gnyis su med par bya ste /
NK038(nyi)004:862: bdag dpal chen po la ci bgyi bka' nod par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:863: dgra la bstan pas 'phar spyang mang po dang /
NK038(nyi)004:864: dur spyang mang po sprul nas ste lha sbyin sna nas yar bzhugs /
NK038(nyi)004:866: don snying smad lnga spar gyis btab nas slar byung ste /
NK038(nyi)004:868: de'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
NK038(nyi)004:869: nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dus drug tu bstab pa bya zhing drag sngags 'don no //
NK038(nyi)004:870: de nas rtags byung ba dang rnal 'byor gcig gi mtho mtshams su /
NK038(nyi)004:871: rgya tshil gyi dud pa btang /
NK038(nyi)004:872: lha dang dbral ba'i cho ga bya /
NK038(nyi)004:873: slar log te phur pa btab pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:877: de nas sbyin bsreg gi las bya /
NK038(nyi)004:878: de nas mnan pa'i las bya ste /
NK038(nyi)004:879: sbyin bsreg gi thal ba lid+ga bya ste ming byang btubs la kha sbyor nang du gzhug /
NK038(nyi)004:880: mkhar nag gam rgyu zhags kyis bsdams /
NK038(nyi)004:881: mnan pa khyer la phur ba bzhis bdag gi bro brdungs bcad de rdzogs so ////
NK038(nyi)004:882: gtad khram mnan pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs so //
NK038(nyi)004:883: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK038(nyi)004:884: dkyil 'khor bdun pa'i rim pa las //
NK038(nyi)004:885: gtad khram mnan pa'i da la ni //
NK038(nyi)004:886: bdud 'dul zhing khams chen mo na //
NK038(nyi)004:887: ston pa sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs //
NK038(nyi)004:888: de yang gdams ngag mdor bkod pa //
NK038(nyi)004:889: slob dpon h'u k+aa ra yi ni //
NK038(nyi)004:890: 'khor lo'i gdams ngag mdor bkod pa //
NK038(nyi)004:891: 'khor lo'i ming byang bri ba ni //
NK038(nyi)004:892: dang po 'khor lo bri bya ni //
NK038(nyi)004:893: lte bar mu khyud 'khor lo dang //
NK038(nyi)004:894: phyi yis 'khor yug me ri bcas //
NK038(nyi)004:895: sbal pa'i ltor tshud kha sbyor bri //
NK038(nyi)004:896: lte bar thig bzhi le tshe dgu /
NK038(nyi)004:897: mu khyud khyim ni bcu gnyis bri //
NK038(nyi)004:898: gzhi snying gcig tu dril ba'i sngags //
NK038(nyi)004:904: mu khyud kyi shar mtshams nas brtsams te g.yas bskor du /
NK038(nyi)004:905: kyi phyi u tsu sma kro ta ma ra ya h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:906: tha ma phata kyi mthar thug par //
NK038(nyi)004:907: g.yas bskor rim pa bzhin du bri //
NK038(nyi)004:908: rus dang ming dang bcas pa bri //
NK038(nyi)004:909: sh+aakya sarba lha sbyin ma ra ya phata /
NK038(nyi)004:912: de'i phyi rim sa bcu drug la //
NK038(nyi)004:918: tshogs kyi sa bon nam rnam shes brgyad dang yul brgyad 'joms pa bri //
NK038(nyi)004:920: yak+sha dz+wa la che ge mo sarba sha trum m+aa ra ya h'u phata //
NK038(nyi)004:921: tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya che ge mos sarba sha trum m+aa ra ya h'u phata /
NK038(nyi)004:922: badz+ra kro ta dz+wa la sa ma ya che ge
NK038(nyi)004:923: mo yak+sha dz+wa la sa ma ya che ge mo
NK038(nyi)004:924: sarba sha trum m+aa ra ya h'u phata /
NK038(nyi)004:925: tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya che ge mo sarba sha trum sa ra ya h'u phata /
NK038(nyi)004:926: badz+ra kro ta dz+wa la sa ma ya che ge
NK038(nyi)004:927: mo yak+sha dz+wa la sa ma ya che ge mo
NK038(nyi)004:928: sarba sha trum ma ra ya h'u phata /
NK038(nyi)004:929: zhes bris la 'khor bzhi'i dmigs bya dgug pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:930: lid+ga gzhug cing bcing ba dang /
NK038(nyi)004:931: dbang du bsdud pa'i las byed pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:933: de'i phyi rim kha sbyor ni /
NK038(nyi)004:934: g.yas bskor g.yon bskor ma 'dzol ba'i /
NK038(nyi)004:935: bris la klu la gtad pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:936: yang na g.yas bskor rkyangs pa la /
NK038(nyi)004:937: mgon po'i gza' mchog ltor chud dur khrod nag po'i 'tshal bzhugs pa'am /
NK038(nyi)004:938: lha khang mgon po'i zhabs 'og tu /
NK038(nyi)004:939: mnan pa byas kyang 'grub par gsung /
NK038(nyi)004:941: de ltar bris pa'i 'khor lo la /
NK038(nyi)004:942: byin rlabs 'khor lo bskor ba ni /
NK038(nyi)004:943: bdag nyid dpa' chen he ru ka'i /
NK038(nyi)004:944: thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros nas mdun gyi 'khor lo la phog pas /
NK038(nyi)004:945: ye shes kyi 'khor lo lcags khang me 'bar ba kha sbyor bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:946: nang du yi ge'i spu gri mtshon cha yis dmigs pa'i phung po lnga dang /
NK038(nyi)004:947: dug sna rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang /
NK038(nyi)004:948: rnam shes brgyad dang yul brgyad gcod cing bskor bar bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:949: nyon mongs pa can nam yid 'khor ba ma stong gi bar du /
NK038(nyi)004:950: rnam rtogs na sku dang ye shes lnga yis thams cad stong nyid rdo rje'i ngang du bskor /
NK038(nyi)004:951: de 'dra'i bskor ba kun gyi thun mong ma yin te /
NK038(nyi)004:952: lta ba dman cing zhe sdang can gyis ni /
NK038(nyi)004:953: gang gi mtshon cha g.yas bskor ba /
NK038(nyi)004:954: dmigs pa'i gzugs phung g.yon bskor bas /
NK038(nyi)004:955: dmigs pa'i gzugs phung 'khor lo spu gris btubs par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:956: 'khor lo lcags khang bar du mnan pas thar ba'i dus med par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:957: de dag 'khor lo bskor ba'i ting nge 'dzin te
NK038(nyi)004:958: skabs skabs dag tu 'khor lo'i rab gnas byed pa
NK038(nyi)004:960: de 'dra'i 'khor lo byin rlabs ldan pa de /
NK038(nyi)004:962: a rang ces bya ba mdze pho'i thod pa'am /
NK038(nyi)004:963: ma nu ra ni rigs ngan nam mdzo /
NK038(nyi)004:965: kri na zhes pa rabs chad nag po'i thod pa'am /
NK038(nyi)004:966: ku ku ra tsa khyi'i thod pa'am /
NK038(nyi)004:967: rabs chad thod pa kha sbyor dkar nag sdams //
NK038(nyi)004:968: mdze rdol thod pa bam ril bag zan bug pa bkag pa la //
NK038(nyi)004:969: mdze thod kyi thod par 'khor lo gtor ma khrag dang //
NK038(nyi)004:970: nyung dkar nag dug thun blugs //
NK038(nyi)004:971: ser bu mi chor ba la chan nan byas la //
NK038(nyi)004:972: yugs sa mo'i dor rta'am re bas dril te bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:973: sa sna bdun gyi 'dag sa la //
NK038(nyi)004:974: mkhar chen phang du 'jug pa ste logs la chag gang khong stong zur gsum bya /
NK038(nyi)004:975: steng du 'dab chags rgyal po bya /
NK038(nyi)004:976: mgon po nag po chag gang pa /
NK038(nyi)004:977: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gsal shing nag po bsnams pa /
NK038(nyi)004:978: mche gtsigs zhabs ni 'grad pa la //
NK038(nyi)004:979: dus su byin rlabs dbang bskur bya //
NK038(nyi)004:980: mchod rten nag po mdzub gang la //
NK038(nyi)004:981: byin rlabs dbang bskur rab gnas bya //
NK038(nyi)004:982: sbyin bsreg byas pa'i thal ba dang //
NK038(nyi)004:983: dri ma rjes dang mgo bo'i ngos rnams la //
NK038(nyi)004:984: lid+ga ming byang bcas bris snying khar gzhug /
NK038(nyi)004:985: bdag nyid chas su 'jug pa ni //
NK038(nyi)004:986: bdag nyid bya khyung rgyal po'am //
NK038(nyi)004:987: phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:988: dri chu tsan dan gla rtsi 'am chus //
NK038(nyi)004:989: khrus byas gu gul nag po dang //
NK038(nyi)004:990: tshil chen mu zi klad pa dang //
NK038(nyi)004:991: phag pa'i sna dang dri chen rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:992: bdag gi lus bsrung rma bya'i mdongs kyi mgo la gdags //
NK038(nyi)004:993: bdud nag mchod phyir lug nag rje ngar bshams //
NK038(nyi)004:994: phyir mi bzlog phyir srid pa'i mda' gzhu khyer //
NK038(nyi)004:995: dmag dpung bzlog phyir drag po'i gtor ma khyer //
NK038(nyi)004:996: las rnams bcol phyir zhi ba'i gtor ma khyer //
NK038(nyi)004:997: mi mthun 'dus pa'i sar song la //
NK038(nyi)004:998: rnal 'byor khros sems stangs stabs kyis //
NK038(nyi)004:999: mi mthun 'bros su mi gzhug ting 'dzin par //
NK038(nyi)004:1000: snang srid lha 'dre dag la gser skyems rgyas par btang //
NK038(nyi)004:1001: las bcol de la zhi ba'i gtor mas mchod //
NK038(nyi)004:1002: ma nyes dpang gsol bya khyung ting 'dzin gyis /
NK038(nyi)004:1003: mchu dang sder mos rlog par bsam shing khru do rko /
NK038(nyi)004:1004: bya chung nga rgyal dag gis sa bdag mo'i rigs la btab /
NK038(nyi)004:1005: dang po'i sa bdag ling gar bcug par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1006: de phyir 'khor lo thod pas mnan /
NK038(nyi)004:1007: nag po gsal shing rjer rdog par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1008: lug nag rje ngar drag gtor rngan par byin /
NK038(nyi)004:1009: de'i steng du mkhar chen dag gis mnan /
NK038(nyi)004:1010: de'i steng du mchod rten nag pos mnan /
NK038(nyi)004:1011: bdag nyid chos gos nag po phyin ka log la drag sngags khur du khur /
NK038(nyi)004:1012: na khas drag sngags bzlos shing par bu khram shing thogs /
NK038(nyi)004:1013: rdo rjes spyang khus dbyung cing bskor ba phyin ci log tu bya /
NK038(nyi)004:1014: rdo rje dur khrod bdag gi stab bstod bya /
NK038(nyi)004:1015: de nas dur khrod g.yam pa nag po ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1016: dur khrod sol bas rdo rje rgya gram bri /
NK038(nyi)004:1018: lam h'u lam stams pa nan bri /
NK038(nyi)004:1022: phyi rol rdo rje rgya gram ba rtse bzhi mtshams bzhi la /
NK038(nyi)004:1023: ru lu kha pa stams pa nan bri /
NK038(nyi)004:1024: g.yam pa nag po dag gis kha bcad mnan /
NK038(nyi)004:1025: 'thas par bcag pa 'o ma tsan dan dag gi chag chag 'dab /
NK038(nyi)004:1026: de nas gom pa nyi shu rtsa gcig phyir dpag la /
NK038(nyi)004:1032: 'di gtad khram mnan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK038(nyi)004:1033: bdag pas blo dman don ched du //
NK038(nyi)004:1034: 'khor lo gtad khram rim pa tsam //
NK038(nyi)004:1035: 'di byas bsod nams phyi rab sgrub pa pos //
NK038(nyi)004:1036: yid la ji ltar bsam pa 'grub par shog /
NK038(nyi)004:1037: gtad khram mnan pa'i dal gyi man ngag /
NK038(nyi)004:1038: slob dpon ti ra ma ti'i dgongs pa rdzogs so //
NK038(nyi)004:1039: da ni mnan no 'og tu mnan //
NK038(nyi)004:1040: ri rab chen po'i 'og tu mnan //
NK038(nyi)004:1041: bsreg go bsreg go dkyil du bsreg /
NK038(nyi)004:1042: me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil du bsreg /
NK038(nyi)004:1043: mnan no mnan no 'og tu mnan //
NK038(nyi)004:1044: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og tu mnan //
NK038(nyi)004:1045: skyon no skyon no rgyab tu skyon //
NK038(nyi)004:1046: rnga mong gwa pa'i rgyab tu bskyon //
NK038(nyi)004:1047: bskur ro bskur ro phyogs su bskur //
NK038(nyi)004:1048: rlung nag 'bar ba'i phyogs su bskur //
NK038(nyi)004:1049: stob po stob po kha ru stob //
NK038(nyi)004:1050: chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru stob //
NK038(nyi)004:1051: phye zhig phye zhig zhal phye zhig /
NK038(nyi)004:1052: sa bdag nag po zhal phye zhig /
NK038(nyi)004:1053: dam nyams dgra bo zhal du rol //
NK038(nyi)004:1054: sa bdag chen po gdug pa'i lus //
NK038(nyi)004:1055: sprul pa chen po'i 'gyur med lus //
NK038(nyi)004:1056: mtshon cha sum brgya drug cu 'phros //
NK038(nyi)004:1057: nag po 'dzin shes gtong mi shes //
NK038(nyi)004:1058: dam nyams dgra bgegs ma btang cig //
NK038(nyi)004:1060: khro bo'i rgyal po gying ka ra //
NK038(nyi)004:1061: khro mo khams gsum dbugs bsdud bcas //
NK038(nyi)004:1062: spyan bzlog pas ni khams su gzir //
NK038(nyi)004:1063: zhabs rnams sdabs pas lha brgyad 'gyed //
NK038(nyi)004:1064: phyag rnams bskyod pas sprul pa 'gyed //
NK038(nyi)004:1065: dbu gsum bskyod pas ri rab 'gyel //
NK038(nyi)004:1066: zhal rnams gdengs pas khams gsum sgrol //
NK038(nyi)004:1067: mche ba gtsigs pas skye shi bcom //
NK038(nyi)004:1068: me dpung 'bar bas khams gsum bsreg /
NK038(nyi)004:1069: khro bo khro mo'i sprul pa 'khrigs //
NK038(nyi)004:1071: rdo rje rgya gram brjid mnan zhabs //
NK038(nyi)004:1072: rdo rje rta bro khyung gshog gdengs //
NK038(nyi)004:1073: shangs nas rlung nag tshub ma 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:1074: zhal nas gdug pa'i sngags zor 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:1075: rkang mthil 'bar ba'i rta bro rdungs //
NK038(nyi)004:1076: gsung gi nga ro rta skad 'tsher //
NK038(nyi)004:1077: dam nyams snying rtsa gcod pa'i bro //
NK038(nyi)004:1078: non cig dgra bo 'og tu gzir //
NK038(nyi)004:1079: badz+ra kro ta dz+wa la sa ma ya //
NK038(nyi)004:1080: dam nyams s+t+wam pa ya stam pa ya h'u dzahdzah h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:1081: drag po rlung gi da la nas //
NK038(nyi)004:1082: gnod sbyin chen po brgya mdud mgo /
NK038(nyi)004:1083: bse gdong zangs mgrin gnod sbyin mo //
NK038(nyi)004:1084: spyan bgrad dgra bo'i yul du blta //
NK038(nyi)004:1085: rkang pas dgra bo ma lus mnan //
NK038(nyi)004:1086: lag pas dgra la sprul pa gtong //
NK038(nyi)004:1087: mgo bos dgra bo'i ldem bu stib //
NK038(nyi)004:1088: kha gdong dam nyams khol bur gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1089: mche ba drag pos snying rtsa gcod //
NK038(nyi)004:1090: rlung nag 'bar bas dgra bgegs bsreg /
NK038(nyi)004:1091: gnod sbyin pho mo'i sprul pa 'khrigs //
NK038(nyi)004:1092: brjid ldan gshin rje'i da la 'du //
NK038(nyi)004:1093: mdung brtse rkang brjid srin po gnon //
NK038(nyi)004:1094: gnod sbyin seng chen khyung gshog sdengs //
NK038(nyi)004:1095: sna nas me yi tsha tsha 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:1096: zhal nas drag po'i sngags zor 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:1097: rkang pa 'bar ba'i seng bro rdungs //
NK038(nyi)004:1098: gsung gi nga ros seng skad 'tsher //
NK038(nyi)004:1099: dam nyams snying rtsa gcod pa'i bro //
NK038(nyi)004:1100: gnod cig yak+sha dam nyams gnon //
NK038(nyi)004:1101: yak+sha dz+wa la sa ma ya //
NK038(nyi)004:1102: dam nyams stam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1107: srin mo gdug pa g.yon du 'khril //
NK038(nyi)004:1108: mig gcig khams gsum ma lus blta //
NK038(nyi)004:1109: ma lus rkang pas phyogs bcur sleb //
NK038(nyi)004:1110: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa phyogs bcur khyab //
NK038(nyi)004:1111: mgo lus khams gsum sa dgu snyil //
NK038(nyi)004:1112: kha nas zhe sdang dug mtsho rngub //
NK038(nyi)004:1113: mche bas dgra bo'i longs spyod gcod //
NK038(nyi)004:1114: me dpung 'bar bas dgra bgegs bsreg /
NK038(nyi)004:1115: srin po srin mo sprul par 'khrigs //
NK038(nyi)004:1116: dbang bsdud me yi dkyil 'khor nas //
NK038(nyi)004:1117: rkang med kha gdangs kun tu rgyug /
NK038(nyi)004:1118: srin po khyung chen sprul gshogs gdengs //
NK038(nyi)004:1119: sna nas chu yi ser chen 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:1120: kha nas drag po'i gzer chen 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:1121: rkang pa 'bar bas khyung bro brdungs //
NK038(nyi)004:1122: khyung gi nga ros khyung skad gdengs //
NK038(nyi)004:1123: dam nyams shan pa byed pa'i bro //
NK038(nyi)004:1124: non cig srin pos dgra bo non //
NK038(nyi)004:1125: rak+sha dz+wa la sa ma ya dam nyams stam pa ni ya stam b+ha ni h'u dzahdzah h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:1126: khrag dang zhag gi dkyil 'khor nas /
NK038(nyi)004:1127: ma mo chen mo rngam pa'i sku //
NK038(nyi)004:1128: mang po dbang sdud dag dang rol //
NK038(nyi)004:1129: mig gcig mas ni khams gsum nyul //
NK038(nyi)004:1130: rdzu 'phrul rkang pas phyogs bcur sleb //
NK038(nyi)004:1131: lag pas 'jig rten nyul byed pa //
NK038(nyi)004:1133: zhal nas drag po'i sngags zer 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:1134: mche gtsigs drag po'i rkan sgra sdebs //
NK038(nyi)004:1135: rlung 'tshub dgra bo rlung la bskur //
NK038(nyi)004:1136: za byed ma mo'i sprul pa 'gyed //
NK038(nyi)004:1137: phung byed khrag gi rims nad gtong //
NK038(nyi)004:1138: gar gyi gom pas kun tu rgyug /
NK038(nyi)004:1139: ma mo dred mgo zhing chen gshog /
NK038(nyi)004:1140: sna nas nad kyi bu yug 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:1141: zhal nas drag po'i sngags zer 'phro //
NK038(nyi)004:1142: rkang mthil 'bar bas dred mo'i bro //
NK038(nyi)004:1143: smra ba ldab ldib bshug glu len //
NK038(nyi)004:1144: nad kyi rkyal pa sdebs re ran //
NK038(nyi)004:1145: rims kyi gru gu phyag na thogs //
NK038(nyi)004:1146: non cig ma mos dgra bgegs non //
NK038(nyi)004:1147: tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya sha trum stam b+ha
NK038(nyi)004:1148: ni s+t+wam b+ha ni h'u dza dzah mgon po'i rta
NK038(nyi)004:1149: bro rdzogs so // dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i bse ston rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi phya dpe /
NK038(nyi)004:1150: glan ban dpal ldan mgon gyis /
NK038(nyi)004:1151: gzhis ka rin chen spungs pa'i mkhar du /
NK038(nyi)004:1152: steng gi skyed tshal du bzhugs tshe bris pa lags so //
NK038(nyi)004:1153: dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1154: dpal mgon po chen po'i las bzhi sngon phyung pa'i man ngag srog gi rgyas gdab la //
NK038(nyi)004:1155: gzer bzhi btab la las bzhi sngon du dbyung //
NK038(nyi)004:1156: dang po'i las ni rnam pa gsum //
NK038(nyi)004:1157: lta ba'i stobs dang bshags sbyangs stobs //
NK038(nyi)004:1158: phyag rgya'i stobs kyi bzhi pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1159: sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba yis //
NK038(nyi)004:1160: ji bzhin de nyid ma bcos na //
NK038(nyi)004:1161: dang po gzhi la gnas byas kyang //
NK038(nyi)004:1162: de nyid gsang sngags ngo bo'i phyir //
NK038(nyi)004:1163: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin la //
NK038(nyi)004:1164: nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin te //
NK038(nyi)004:1165: de ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam //
NK038(nyi)004:1166: yon tan mtshan grangs mang du nges //
NK038(nyi)004:1167: de yang 'di ltar shes par bya //
NK038(nyi)004:1168: sna tshogs snang ba sems yin no //
NK038(nyi)004:1169: gsal rig rang byung ngo bor gnas //
NK038(nyi)004:1170: dkyil zhes rang byung spros dang bral //
NK038(nyi)004:1172: thig le rang bzhin ye shes gsal //
NK038(nyi)004:1173: gnas lugs ji bzhin nyid de la //
NK038(nyi)004:1174: yul rtog blo yis ma bcos na //
NK038(nyi)004:1175: ji ltar snang ba gnas lugs nyid //
NK038(nyi)004:1176: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyod kyang //
NK038(nyi)004:1178: de nyid spyod yul min pas gsang //
NK038(nyi)004:1179: yon tan 'byung gnas nyid du basngagasa //
NK038(nyi)004:1180: mi dmigs ngang las kun 'byung bas //
NK038(nyi)004:1181: ngo bo nyid ces brjod par zad //
NK038(nyi)004:1182: rgyu rkyen gnyen po med pa dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1184: mtshan ma bdag rtog bcom pa'i phyir //
NK038(nyi)004:1185: rdo rje zhes su bshad pa yin //
NK038(nyi)004:1186: bdag med yul bral ma bcos pa //
NK038(nyi)004:1187: gsal stong rig pa'i ye shes te //
NK038(nyi)004:1188: dngos po kun bcom pa zhes brjod //
NK038(nyi)004:1189: rang bzhin de ltar mthong ba la //
NK038(nyi)004:1190: nam mkha'i spriin dang cho 'phrul ltar //
NK038(nyi)004:1191: sna tshogs ma 'gags rang shar nas //
NK038(nyi)004:1192: rang snang rang grol 'gyur snyam med //
NK038(nyi)004:1193: de ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam //
NK038(nyi)004:1194: bdud rtog 'khrul pa rang zhig nas //
NK038(nyi)004:1195: mi mthun gnyen po rang grol te //
NK038(nyi)004:1196: thams cad sems kyi ngang du zhi //
NK038(nyi)004:1197: rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar gsal //
NK038(nyi)004:1198: rang snang lhar bsgom snying khar h'u //
NK038(nyi)004:1199: bgegs bskrad phyogs bsrung dul sprul te //
NK038(nyi)004:1200: bshags sbyangs mchod cing thugs dam bskul //
NK038(nyi)004:1201: bshags bkrus bum pa'i lung gsum gyi //
NK038(nyi)004:1202: zhi ba chen po'i dngos grub thob //
NK038(nyi)004:1211: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he rat+na sur+ya /
NK038(nyi)004:1214: sa man dza yis dbang po dgug /
NK038(nyi)004:1216: bla ma rig 'dzin bsrung mar bcas //
NK038(nyi)004:1217: ye shes sems dpa'i gnas su stim //
NK038(nyi)004:1218: dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
NK038(nyi)004:1219: dri med dung mdog rnam dag la //
NK038(nyi)004:1221: ye shes sku gsung thugs dang ldan //
NK038(nyi)004:1222: rin chen mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
NK038(nyi)004:1223: sku stod dar dkar stod g.yogs la //
NK038(nyi)004:1224: sku smad ba ti'i tshe dgu gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1225: g.yas pa shel gyi ral gri la //
NK038(nyi)004:1226: yu ba gser gyi rdo rjes brgyan //
NK038(nyi)004:1227: g.yon pa bdud rtsi'i bum pa la //
NK038(nyi)004:1228: kha brgyan nor bu rin chen mdzes //
NK038(nyi)004:1229: byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun la //
NK038(nyi)004:1230: gsung gi gzugs brnyan phreng bar babs //
NK038(nyi)004:1231: dra ba'i rgya mig bcad pa dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1232: nyes pa'i dri ma kun dag nas //
NK038(nyi)004:1233: thugs kyi bde ba rang 'bar te //
NK038(nyi)004:1234: dngos grub snod du rung bar bsam //
NK038(nyi)004:1237: badz+ra sat+wa te no pa tish+tha /
NK038(nyi)004:1240: a nu rak+to me b+ha wa /
NK038(nyi)004:1241: su po sh+yo me b+ha wah sarba sid+hi m+me pra yats+tsha /
NK038(nyi)004:1243: tsit+tam sh+ri yan ku ru h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:1245: b+ha ga wan sarba ta th+aa ga ta /
NK038(nyi)004:1248: ma h+aa sa ma ya sa t+wa +aah rab ni rtag tu dus gcig la //
NK038(nyi)004:1249: brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar ma bcad //
NK038(nyi)004:1250: 'bring ni nyin gsum mtshan gsum du //
NK038(nyi)004:1251: nyin zhag gcig la dus drug dran //
NK038(nyi)004:1252: tha ma nyin zhag re re la //
NK038(nyi)004:1253: brgya rtsa re re ma dran na //
NK038(nyi)004:1254: dngos grub dam pa'i yul min no //
NK038(nyi)004:1255: rnal 'byor dam par gyur pa na //
NK038(nyi)004:1256: rang gi lus ni rdul snyed spro //
NK038(nyi)004:1257: dbang po nam mkha'i rang bzhin la //
NK038(nyi)004:1258: byang chub sems kyi gsung rgyun gsal //
NK038(nyi)004:1259: gsal gsum dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK038(nyi)004:1260: bshags pa'i 'bras bus yid ches sbyangs //
NK038(nyi)004:1261: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal ba rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:1262: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig yid skyob cig /
NK038(nyi)004:1263: rdo rje sems dpa' nye zhing brtan par mdzod //
NK038(nyi)004:1264: bde bar gyur cig kun tu bde gyur cig /
NK038(nyi)004:1265: shin tu bdag la thugs rjes chags par mdzod //
NK038(nyi)004:1266: bdag nyid shin tu bde bar mdzad gyur cig /
NK038(nyi)004:1267: dngos grub thams cad bdag la stsol mdzod cig /
NK038(nyi)004:1268: phrin las thams cad dag par mdzod cig bdag /
NK038(nyi)004:1269: sems nyid dpal du mdzod cig thugs dgyes bde //
NK038(nyi)004:1270: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun //
NK038(nyi)004:1271: rdo rje thugs kyi dkyil du bdag dril cig /
NK038(nyi)004:1272: rdo rje 'byung ba chen po'i dam tshig gi //
NK038(nyi)004:1273: sems dpa' skye med klong du dag par mdzod //
NK038(nyi)004:1278: bla ma dkon mchog rig 'dzin rtsal 'chang /
NK038(nyi)004:1279: dam can rgya mtsho chos skyong bsrung ma ye shes kyi spyan dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1281: rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan dang ldan pa rnams kyi spyan
NK038(nyi)004:1282: lam du mi mdzes pa thams cad mthol lo bshags
NK038(nyi)004:1283: so // tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas las
NK038(nyi)004:1284: kyi sgrib pa thams cad shin+tam ku ru ye s+w+aa
NK038(nyi)004:1285: so // h+aa / nyams sgrib sdig sgrim shimn+ta ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK038(nyi)004:1287: nal grib rnol grib shimn+ta log sgrib mna' grib shimn+ta las gyi sgrib pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1288: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1290: lta ba dman pa'i sgrib pa dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1291: chos kyi 'phongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad shimn+ta ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK038(nyi)004:1292: nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi shimn+ta ku ru bgegs rigs
NK038(nyi)004:1293: stong phrag brgyad bcu shimn+ta ku ru ye 'grogs sum
NK038(nyi)004:1294: brgya drug cu shimn+ta rkyen ngan nyi khri chig stong
NK038(nyi)004:1295: // rnal 'byor pa bdag gi lus la nad dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1305: rgyu skar mi mthun pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1308: sdang sems kyis kun nas blang ba'i mi kha dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1309: dgra bgegs la sogs pa tshe rabs kyi las ngan pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1310: 'phral gyi rkyen ngan gyis lus la gnod cing sems
NK038(nyi)004:1311: la gzir bar byed pa'i bkra mi shis pa thams
NK038(nyi)004:1312: cad shit+nam ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK038(nyi)004:1313: s+w+aa b+ha wa shud+d+ha sarba d+har+m+aahswa b+ha wa shud+d+ho&a ham /
NK038(nyi)004:1314: na ma sarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:1316: sa rba tad kham ung+ga kham te s+pha ra na
NK038(nyi)004:1317: hi mam ga ga na kham sa ma ye s+w+aa
NK038(nyi)004:1318: h+aa / ra rat+na man+da la tram s+pha ra na phatah sam ha ra na h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:1320: na mo gu ru sarba ta th+aa push+pe p+au tsa
NK038(nyi)004:1321: me g+ha sa mun+t+ra s+pha ra na i mam ga
NK038(nyi)004:1322: ga na kham sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK038(nyi)004:1323: bdag nyid dpal chen po'i mchod pa 'di //
NK038(nyi)004:1324: rang rig ye shes dbang po gsal //
NK038(nyi)004:1325: rang lus rin chen sprul pas mchod //
NK038(nyi)004:1326: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa yis //
NK038(nyi)004:1327: phyi nang gsang ba'i rten mchod rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:1328: kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin gyis //
NK038(nyi)004:1329: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo ru //
NK038(nyi)004:1330: bdag nyid chen pos mnyes mchod bsngo //
NK038(nyi)004:1331: na mo sarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yo /
NK038(nyi)004:1333: sarba tad kham ud+ga te s+pha ra na hi mam ga ga na kham s+w+aa h+aa /
NK038(nyi)004:1334: phyi nang gsang ba'i grangs bzhin du //
NK038(nyi)004:1335: ting 'dzin sngags kyi sngon gsum mchod //
NK038(nyi)004:1336: hoh rgyal ba rgya mtsho thams cad dgongs su gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1337: mchod pa rgya mtsho bzhes su gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1338: thugs dam rgya mtsho thams cad bskang du gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1339: dngos grub rgya mtsho thams cad stsal du gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1340: phrin las rgya mtsho thams cad mdzad du gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1342: dus gsum gyi bla ma rin po che rnams la skyabs su mchi /
NK038(nyi)004:1343: skyabs chen lha jo bo dkon mchog gsum gyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK038(nyi)004:1344: rtsa ba dang brgyud pa'i bla ma rig 'dzin rnams kyi byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK038(nyi)004:1345: dngos grub thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang bsgrub mchog yi dam gyi lha'i byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK038(nyi)004:1346: mthu stobs nus pa phun sum tshogs pa dam pa
NK038(nyi)004:1347: chos bsrung ba'i srung ma rnams kyis byin gyis brlab
NK038(nyi)004:1348: tu gsol / khyed kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos
NK038(nyi)004:1349: grub da lta nyid du thob par mdzod du gsol
NK038(nyi)004:1350: tu gsol / / mthu bstan du gsol /
NK038(nyi)004:1352: rtsa ba'i bla ma byin rlabs can /
NK038(nyi)004:1353: rgyud pa'i bla ma byin rlabs can /
NK038(nyi)004:1354: rang byung gi bla ma 'od gsal can /
NK038(nyi)004:1355: bde chen sku dang dri med gsungs //
NK038(nyi)004:1356: skye med thugs kyi byin gyis brlab du gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1357: lus bde chen rang 'bar du byin gyis rlabs /
NK038(nyi)004:1358: ngag nus pa thog med du sems rtogs pa kun grol du byin gyis rlabs du gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1360: lus ngag yid gsum rtse gcig tu //
NK038(nyi)004:1361: bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa zhu //
NK038(nyi)004:1362: skyabs gnas gsum gyi gnas gsum nas //
NK038(nyi)004:1363: 'bru gsum byin rlabs mtsho rgyun bzhin //
NK038(nyi)004:1365: bdag nyid kun tu bzang por bskyed //
NK038(nyi)004:1366: yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku nyid gsal //
NK038(nyi)004:1368: h'u h'u sarba ta th+aa ga ta badz+ra tsit+ta /
NK038(nyi)004:1369: kun bzang zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
NK038(nyi)004:1370: mthing ka sku gsung thugs dang ldan //
NK038(nyi)004:1371: g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal //
NK038(nyi)004:1372: rang byung rigs lngas dbu la brgyan //
NK038(nyi)004:1373: g.yas kyi dang po bsnams pa ni //
NK038(nyi)004:1374: gser gyi rdo rje rtse dgu la //
NK038(nyi)004:1375: bar pa kha t+wam rtse gsum 'phyar //
NK038(nyi)004:1376: tha ma b+han+d+ha stag sprod rnga //
NK038(nyi)004:1377: g.yon gyi dang po b+han dmar gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1378: bar pa srin po'i rgyu zhags la //
NK038(nyi)004:1379: tha ma dril bu khyung khrar bcas //
NK038(nyi)004:1380: dur khrod chas dang ldan pa la //
NK038(nyi)004:1381: rin chen sna tshogs brgyan gyis spras //
NK038(nyi)004:1382: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las //
NK038(nyi)004:1384: mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'i tshul du bzhugs //
NK038(nyi)004:1385: rgya khyon nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
NK038(nyi)004:1386: shes bya'i da la yongs rdzogs yin //
NK038(nyi)004:1391: ces pa yan chad kyi don grol /
NK038(nyi)004:1392: de las khro bo byed na kun bzang he ru kar bskyed la /
NK038(nyi)004:1393: ru lu brgya rtsa re bgrang /
NK038(nyi)004:1394: rgyun bsnyen la 'jug na zhi ba'i gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1395: mdo mgon gyi sgrub thabs bzhugs so //
NK038(nyi)004:1396: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1397: dang po man+dala bca' ba dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1398: pu tsa lnga dang gtor ma sman phud rak+ta bsham /
NK038(nyi)004:1399: mtshams bcad pa dang byin rlabs spyi dang mthun /
NK038(nyi)004:1402: de nas mdun du ka man+da la b+h+rum /
NK038(nyi)004:1403: ces pa dur khrod kyi dbus su /
NK038(nyi)004:1404: keng rus ri rab kyi steng du /
NK038(nyi)004:1405: lcags mkhar nag po zur gsum bskyed /
NK038(nyi)004:1406: rdo rje brag dang nyi ma'i gdan la /
NK038(nyi)004:1408: ma h+aa ka la g+ha na pra ti h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:1410: de la bsnyen pa'i dus su ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'am /
NK038(nyi)004:1411: phyag gnyis pa gang rung du bskyed la /
NK038(nyi)004:1412: las la sbyor ba'i dus ni phyag gnyis pa kho na'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1413: sku mdog sngo nag zhabs gnyis dpa' bo rol pa'i 'dug stangs su rkyang bskum du bzhugs pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1414: dbu skra kham nag gyen du bardzesa pa nyi zlas brgyan pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1415: glang po che'i ko rlon dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1416: zhing gi g.yang gzhi stag gi sham thabs /
NK038(nyi)004:1417: thod 'phreng sbrul chun gyis brgyan pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1420: ljags 'dril zhing mche ba brtsigs pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1421: phyag g.yas kyi dang po shes rab kyi ral gri /
NK038(nyi)004:1422: 'og ma tsan dan gyii beng chen khyu mchog gi rgyal mtshan spras pa bsnams pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1423: g.yon gyi dang po na rdo rje zhags pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1424: 'og ma na rtse gsum pa gdengs pa bsnams pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1426: dar ber sngo khra sku la mnabs pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1427: phyag g.yas na tsan dan gyi beng chen sngon po /
NK038(nyi)004:1428: g.yon pa na thod pa khrag dang bcas pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1429: ljags 'dril zhing rkan sgra tog pa se ral sked la bcings pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1430: thod phreng lcags sgrog gi brgyan pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1431: de nas spyan drangs pa ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1433: gshegs su gsol ces pa dang sngags kyi 'khor lo dpag tu med pa dang bcas byon par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1434: de yang sa g.yo ba dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1437: sgra 'od la sogs pa byung bar du spyan drangs ba bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1438: rdo rje brag chen ces pa nas /
NK038(nyi)004:1439: gnyis su med par stim ste bzhugs su gsol /
NK038(nyi)004:1440: don dang ldan pa'i bstod pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1442: de nas mchod pa 'bul ba ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1443: spros pa'am bsdus pa'i tshul gyis thun mong gi p+au tsa lnga dbul bar bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1444: la du la phug ces pas sngags dang bcas pas gtor ma mchod do //
NK038(nyi)004:1445: de nas dam tshig dbog pa ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1446: rdo rje can gyi rnal 'byor ces pas /
NK038(nyi)004:1447: bdud rtsi'i nang du 'bru gsum dkar dmar mthing gar bsgom /
NK038(nyi)004:1448: bdud rtsi gtor mas tshogs bdag gi gnas gsum du
NK038(nyi)004:1449: 'bru gsum thim pas sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig
NK038(nyi)004:1453: ces pas kho'i dam tshig blang nas dam bcas par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1454: nar bu tshar bu ces kho'i mna' blang bar bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1455: de nas dam tshig pa bsre ste /
NK038(nyi)004:1456: rdo rje dri bcas pas bdag gi lan gsum blangs kho na la yang byin pas /
NK038(nyi)004:1457: 'bral ba med par grogs su sam /
NK038(nyi)004:1458: ma h+aa mtsho gling ces pas dam brdar /
NK038(nyi)004:1459: de nas tshogs kyi bdag po mthu bo che ces pas thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul /
NK038(nyi)004:1460: bza' ba po bkug la stim la bstab pa bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1461: lag tu me tog thogs la 'dod yon gsol te /
NK038(nyi)004:1462: thal mo gdab la smon lam btab /
NK038(nyi)004:1463: bsnyen bsgrub bzhi dril la 'dzab bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1464: de nas bcol ring btang ngo //
NK038(nyi)004:1466: lus srung ba la sogs pa bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1467: gzhan yang rdo rje ro langs 'khor dang bcas //
NK038(nyi)004:1468: 'brel phyir de dag dam tshig ni //
NK038(nyi)004:1470: gsal shing bing dang thod tri shul //
NK038(nyi)004:1471: rim lugs 'bur gshos gzhong skas bya //
NK038(nyi)004:1472: yan lag bzhi las mthu can nyid //
NK038(nyi)004:1473: rtag tu bcang bar bya ba yin //
NK038(nyi)004:1476: sngags bzhi ga bris la bcug la rtag tu bcang /
NK038(nyi)004:1477: mchod pa'i rdzas sha chen la sogs pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1478: lus la tshil chen gu gul bcang /
NK038(nyi)004:1479: sku'i rten bris sku la sogs pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1481: gsung gi sngags dang glegs bam dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1484: g.yag rog po la brten baca'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1485: rgyun du byas na las gang yang 'grub bo //
NK038(nyi)004:1486: bgegs gnod la bya kyi 'jug na gdon ma ra ya phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK038(nyi)004:1487: ces gdags gzhung bzhin spyad na /
NK038(nyi)004:1488: 'di dang phyi ma'i dngos grub the tshom med par 'grub bo //
NK038(nyi)004:1490: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1491: drag po'i las la sbyar ba ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1492: bdag nyid dpal chen po ye shes lnga dang ldan
NK038(nyi)004:1493: pas bdag gi zhal nas phar sngags kyi 'od zer
NK038(nyi)004:1495: de'i sna la lcags kyu'i mtshan pa 'phros te /
NK038(nyi)004:1496: drag po'i tshad ni gyad kyi mda' 'phang pa lta bu bsgom /
NK038(nyi)004:1497: lha sbyin gyi rgyud la phog pa ni lcags kyi thog rgyab pa lta bu'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1498: snying po byang chub kyi bcud bsdus te tshur 'dus
NK038(nyi)004:1499: pa ni skud pa dkar nag sgrib la lta bu'o
NK038(nyi)004:1500: // bdag nyid la thim pas bdag dpal chen po bkrag mdangs dang ldan par gyur te /
NK038(nyi)004:1501: dgra bo'i tshe srog dang bkrag mdangs bdag gi thob pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1502: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyi phung po
NK038(nyi)004:1503: lhag ma mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la btab pa byas te
NK038(nyi)004:1504: / 'di ni ye shes lha'i bzlas pa la sbyar ro //
NK038(nyi)004:1505: las kyi lha'i bzlas pa la gsum ste /
NK038(nyi)004:1506: bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa las sbyor ro //
NK038(nyi)004:1507: dang po la rten pa bshams te /
NK038(nyi)004:1508: dal la brten nas bsgrub na /
NK038(nyi)004:1510: yang na sa rnam pa gsum la mkhar rtsigs te /
NK038(nyi)004:1512: logs bzhi la lto dkar bzhi bya /
NK038(nyi)004:1516: steng du bya khyung gi mu tra nag po gsum bya /
NK038(nyi)004:1517: de'i nang du gru gsum mthing nag gi steng du /
NK038(nyi)004:1519: mda' sgro yud lnga pa dug med bcug pa'i mgul du dar mthing nag gi le'u gdag /
NK038(nyi)004:1520: de la phur pa ril bu rten pa'i rdzas dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1521: bar du khrol bu brab pa'i rdzas dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1522: mtha' ma phye ma mchod pa'i rdzas so //
NK038(nyi)004:1523: phur pa ling+ga'i snying gar gzugs /
NK038(nyi)004:1524: khro bo'i rdzas ni nam mkha' sngon po /
NK038(nyi)004:1525: gser yig la bya rgod kyi phod bzhi la dar lce gdags /
NK038(nyi)004:1526: de mda' stong du bcug la bzhag go //
NK038(nyi)004:1527: khro bo'i rdzas ni za ma tog rdzas kyi tshogs kyis bskang ba dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1528: sha khrag sna tshogs pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1530: ri rab kyi phyi bskor gyi thod khrag dang bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:1531: khro mo'i rdzas thod pa'i tshal bu gcig gi nang du /
NK038(nyi)004:1533: khrag sna tshogs kyi bkang la bzhag go //
NK038(nyi)004:1534: de nas khro bo'i zhal bcas la mkhar gyi nang du bdag nyid la kha bstan la bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:1535: de nas bsnyen bsgrub tshul bzhin bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1536: de nas las la sbyar ba ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1539: ma nyes pa'i dpang gzugs so //
NK038(nyi)004:1540: de nas drag po'i sngags bzlas so //
NK038(nyi)004:1541: de nas dpal chen po'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros
NK038(nyi)004:1542: pas las kyi mgon po rtsal gyi bton gzhi'i mgon
NK038(nyi)004:1546: za byed dur phag dang gcan zan gcod byed la sogs pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1547: ce spyang mang po sprul nas zas pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1548: sna bug na yar zhugs nas nang khrol thams cad
NK038(nyi)004:1549: zhal du rngubs te don snying spar gyis btab nas
NK038(nyi)004:1550: / slar phyung ste mgon po nyid la stob par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1551: de lta bu'i sbyor ba bstab pa'i las bya zhing /
NK038(nyi)004:1552: h+ya drag po bzlas pas so //
NK038(nyi)004:1553: de nas mtshan ma phebs pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1557: mtshon gyi btab la bsgral bar bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1559: zor dang mnan pa bya ba ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1560: ye shes lha yi gzhung ltar bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1562: legs ldan dbang gi sgrub thabs bzhugs so //
NK038(nyi)004:1563: tshogs bdag mgon po legs ldan gyis /
NK038(nyi)004:1564: dbang chen stobs kyi sbyor ba yang /
NK038(nyi)004:1565: ri rgyal rtse nas sa dang shing /
NK038(nyi)004:1566: lha rgod po yod pa'i sa /
NK038(nyi)004:1567: tshong 'dus chen po yi sa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1568: rgyas sa zin pa'i mkhar mkhar gyi sa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1569: chos ye shes chen po srid thob pa'i khri stegs dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1570: btsun mo mtshan gyi sa dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1571: bka' byin chen dur khrod kyi //
NK038(nyi)004:1572: sa la bsad khrag mtshal gyi bru //
NK038(nyi)004:1573: 'brub khung khru gang zla gam gdengs //
NK038(nyi)004:1574: nang rim gsum la mtshal rgya skyegs //
NK038(nyi)004:1575: tsan dan dmar pos legs par byugs //
NK038(nyi)004:1576: rgyal blon stobs chen mu stegs dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1577: bgegs chen gcan zan gdug pa dang //
