NK038(nyi)004:1578: mi dang mi min stobs chen rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:1579: dbang du 'du bar gang dmigs pa'i //
NK038(nyi)004:1580: rdzas la gzugs byas ming byang dgod //
NK038(nyi)004:1581: thod pa srub med nang du gzhug /
NK038(nyi)004:1585: i tsi ki byi u tsusma kro ta h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:1591: mgo nag mi rnams sarba pa sham ku ru hrim
NK038(nyi)004:1592: hrim pa sham ma na ma hrim hrim dzahdzah ra
NK038(nyi)004:1593: ga du ni ces bzlas so //
NK038(nyi)004:1595: bdag nyid mgon po legs ldan che //
NK038(nyi)004:1596: dmar nag pad+ma r+aa ga'i mdog /
NK038(nyi)004:1597: phyag g.yas lcags kyu 'gug mdzad cing //
NK038(nyi)004:1598: g.yon pas zhags pa dmar po brdeg /
NK038(nyi)004:1599: thugs sngags dang 'od zer thams cad dmar po /
NK038(nyi)004:1601: gang la bya ba'i rten la phog /
NK038(nyi)004:1602: rang gi 'od kyi dbang med bkug /
NK038(nyi)004:1603: khab len rdo la lcags 'du ltar //
NK038(nyi)004:1604: thams cad bdag dbang 'du bar bsam //
NK038(nyi)004:1605: shing thog ga la ltar bur dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1606: dgun 'brum me tog dmar po dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1607: sha khrag gsar pa'i mchod pa 'bul //
NK038(nyi)004:1608: tshil chen mngal khrag mtshan ldan dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1609: rgya skyegs tsan dan dkar dmar dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1610: gi hang bse zho ling gar byug /
NK038(nyi)004:1611: seng ldeng me la bsro zhing bzlas //
NK038(nyi)004:1612: grub nas thod pa dar dmar dril /
NK038(nyi)004:1613: rang gi mal 'og dag tu sba //
NK038(nyi)004:1616: mi dang mi min snga bas na //
NK038(nyi)004:1617: lhag par bka' la nyan par 'gyur //
NK038(nyi)004:1618: rgyal blon stobs can gdug pa can //
NK038(nyi)004:1619: ji ltar bsgo ba dran bzhin byed /
NK038(nyi)004:1620: khams gsum mdzes ldan phyag rgya mnga' //
NK038(nyi)004:1622: rbod chen ye shes don chen kun //
NK038(nyi)004:1623: ji ltar bgos pa'i las bzhin byed //
NK038(nyi)004:1624: mche sder rwa can lce dug sogs //
NK038(nyi)004:1625: rang rang khyi bzhin phyi na 'breng //
NK038(nyi)004:1626: 'bru dang rin chen zas bcud la //
NK038(nyi)004:1627: gong bzhin sbyor ba bzhin sgrubs nas //
NK038(nyi)004:1628: snang srid zas nor bdag dbang du //
NK038(nyi)004:1629: dbang chen kun bsdud sbyor ba yin //
NK038(nyi)004:1631: rgyas bas dbang bsdud rtsa bar 'gyur //
NK038(nyi)004:1632: rdo rje che ge mo +aah h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:1633: h'u seng de bskyed yid bsdus spu ho /
NK038(nyi)004:1634: sa le bskyed le bsdus spu ho /
NK038(nyi)004:1635: seng skyed ngag bsdus ngag bsdus spungs ho /
NK038(nyi)004:1636: ma h+aa k+aa la sarba ba sud+ha ra h'u dzah
NK038(nyi)004:1637: dzah ra tri sarba ba sud+ha ra h'u dzahdzah rak+sha
NK038(nyi)004:1638: sarba ba su d+har h'u dza dzahyak+sha sarba ba su
NK038(nyi)004:1639: d+ha ra h'u dza dzah ma ma ba su d+ha
NK038(nyi)004:1640: ra h'u dza dzah na ga sarba ba su d+ha
NK038(nyi)004:1641: ra h'u dza dzah sa ma ya ba su d+ha
NK038(nyi)004:1642: ra h'u dza dzah ru tri sarba ba su d+ha
NK038(nyi)004:1643: ra h'u dza dzah'akhora lo 'bar ba'i lte ba la
NK038(nyi)004:1644: / bsgrub pa po yi gsang mtshan dgod //
NK038(nyi)004:1645: de la rin chen zur bzhi bskor //
NK038(nyi)004:1646: sgo gsum rgyas par bsdu ba yin //
NK038(nyi)004:1649: nor gyi bdag po sde brgyad basngagasa //
NK038(nyi)004:1650: rtsa ba'i sngags ltar dgod par bya //
NK038(nyi)004:1652: yi ge mgo nang du bstan la dgod //
NK038(nyi)004:1653: brgya rtsa bsnyen la me tog gtor //
NK038(nyi)004:1654: mgul lam g.yas la sha mtshan bzhin //
NK038(nyi)004:1656: nang nub rgyas pa'i gtor ma btang //
NK038(nyi)004:1658: rat+na brdar te sems bskyed ldan //
NK038(nyi)004:1659: sbyangs spel sngags kyi byin gyis rlabs //
NK038(nyi)004:1663: tram rat+na tree lo kya +aah h'u /
NK038(nyi)004:1665: ma h+aa ka la tri yak+sha rak+sha /
NK038(nyi)004:1668: na ga ra dza ba su d+ha ra sa ma ya h'u dza /
NK038(nyi)004:1669: tshe dang bsod nams bdag po kun //
NK038(nyi)004:1670: spyan drangs de la mchod pa 'bul //
NK038(nyi)004:1671: gang ltar 'dod pa yid la bsam //
NK038(nyi)004:1672: ma h+aa k+aa lo tri yak+sha rak+sha /
NK038(nyi)004:1674: ma ma trag rak+sha na ga rak+sha dza sarba ba
NK038(nyi)004:1675: su d+ha ra man ba lim ta gri ha na
NK038(nyi)004:1678: gsang ba sde brgyad kyi yang snying //
NK038(nyi)004:1679: gab pa sngags gter gyi lha tshogs //
NK038(nyi)004:1680: sbas pa dbang mdzod kyi lde mig /
NK038(nyi)004:1681: ba su d+ha ra'i bdag po kun //
NK038(nyi)004:1682: dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK038(nyi)004:1684: bsam pa yin bzhin 'grub gyur cig /
NK038(nyi)004:1685: srog bdud sngags 'khor yid la bcangs //
NK038(nyi)004:1686: las bzhi mngon du gab gyur yang //
NK038(nyi)004:1687: tha ma rgyas pa'i gtor ma bsdu //
NK038(nyi)004:1688: rnal 'byor lus la brten gyis bar //
NK038(nyi)004:1690: kun la yod na khyad par ci //
NK038(nyi)004:1691: gzhan la zag na gnod kyi skyon //
NK038(nyi)004:1692: bdag gi dngos grub 'gyangs srid pas //
NK038(nyi)004:1693: de na las 'di gsang bar rigs //
NK038(nyi)004:1694: mgon po'i dbang sdud kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
NK038(nyi)004:1695: klan ston chen po bsod nams mgon po'i phyag dpe las /
NK038(nyi)004:1696: bdag rat+na sh+r+ai b+ha dras bris ////
NK038(nyi)004:1697: bka' sdod pho nya'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhal khrigs bzhugs so //
NK038(nyi)004:1698: bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1699: legs ldan dur khrod nag po bsgrub pa'i thabs ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1700: gzhung dang mthun pa'i gnas su stegs bu gru bzhi brtsigs /
NK038(nyi)004:1701: sems can sna tshogs 'khor gyi tshul du bri /
NK038(nyi)004:1702: dbus su gru gsum ming rus bsregs pas thal bas bri /
NK038(nyi)004:1703: de'i steng du dur khrod bdag po sku mdog nag po /
NK038(nyi)004:1705: zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1706: sku la zhing gi g.yang gzhi /
NK038(nyi)004:1707: stag gi phyar hrul gyon pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1708: phyag na ru mtshon nag po phyar ba /
NK038(nyi)004:1709: sdong la rno ba'i mtshon btags la gcig bzhengs la /
NK038(nyi)004:1710: de'i 'khor na dur khrod kyi goo ri /
NK038(nyi)004:1714: gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskor bar bsgom mo //
NK038(nyi)004:1715: brten rdzas ni stag sha mi sha lug sha /
NK038(nyi)004:1716: gcan zan sna tshogs kyi sha dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1728: mi rus sna tshogs bsog go //
NK038(nyi)004:1729: lha bshos nag po la mda' nag po btsugs /
NK038(nyi)004:1731: zhal zas sha la sogs pas brgyan la dbul lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1732: sha sna tshogs pa la sogs pa b+han+d+ha lcang lo'i nang du btsal la dbul lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1733: zhing chen ming rus yan chad sbyin bsreg tu dbul lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1734: dug la sogs pa'i khrag sna dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1736: ming rus rnams ni drag po'i dus su ming rus dang bsres la dbul lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1737: dang po bdag nyid dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par bya /
NK038(nyi)004:1739: 'phrin las gzhung srang mchod pa dang bshags pa bya /
NK038(nyi)004:1740: sngags gsum 'bum las nyung ba mi bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1744: h+r+aih rgyal ba kun gyi chos sku pad+ma'i gdung /
NK038(nyi)004:1745: ces pa bsnyen pa'i lha bskul /
NK038(nyi)004:1747: dur khrod gnas la dbang bsgyur ba'i //
NK038(nyi)004:1748: dbang phyug chen po dur khrod bdag /
NK038(nyi)004:1749: legs ldan nag po mthu bo che //
NK038(nyi)004:1750: sku la zhing dang stag lpag gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1751: thal chen zhag dang tshom bus brgyan //
NK038(nyi)004:1752: dbu skra kham nag gyen du bardzesa //
NK038(nyi)004:1753: lag na dar nag ru mtshon 'phyar //
NK038(nyi)004:1754: dmag dpon chen po da tshur spyon //
NK038(nyi)004:1755: lha chen bzhugs pa'i sku mkhar ni //
NK038(nyi)004:1756: ri yi rgyal po ma la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:1757: gnas ni bam ri thod pa mkhar //
NK038(nyi)004:1758: de dang mthun pa'i gnas 'di ru //
NK038(nyi)004:1759: lha chen legs ldan gshegs su gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1760: dur khrod gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1761: bam chen gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1762: dbang phyug chen po srin po'i gtso //
NK038(nyi)004:1763: legs ldan nag po dam tshig can //
NK038(nyi)004:1764: 'khor ni srin po srin mos bskor //
NK038(nyi)004:1765: 'khor bcas thugs dam dus la babs //
NK038(nyi)004:1766: dbang phyug khyed kyi sprul pa ste //
NK038(nyi)004:1767: stag dang dom dang sdig pa sbrul //
NK038(nyi)004:1768: seng ge khyi spyang mche ba can //
NK038(nyi)004:1769: bya rgod kha skeg sder mo can //
NK038(nyi)004:1770: sprul pa mang po 'jig rten khengs //
NK038(nyi)004:1771: sprul pa mang po bsam mi khyab //
NK038(nyi)004:1772: nag po chen po rdzu 'phrul can //
NK038(nyi)004:1773: mi sha khyi sha rta sha dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1774: gcan zan mang po'i sha dag khrag /
NK038(nyi)004:1775: sman dang bshos dang mda' dar dang //
NK038(nyi)004:1776: mthun pa'i dam rdzas bshams pa rnams //
NK038(nyi)004:1777: legs ldan 'khor dang bcas la dbul //
NK038(nyi)004:1778: khyod kyi sku la thim mdzod la //
NK038(nyi)004:1780: da lta nyid du bsgral 'tshal lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1781: da lta nyid du dbang gyis shig /
NK038(nyi)004:1782: srog bdag nag po ma rungs pa //
NK038(nyi)004:1783: bdud 'dul chen po mi bsrun pa //
NK038(nyi)004:1784: khyod kyi 'khor gyi sprul pa ni //
NK038(nyi)004:1785: srin po'i tshogs te gdug pa can //
NK038(nyi)004:1786: las su gsod dang gcod la dga' //
NK038(nyi)004:1787: dgra bo bsad bcad dus la babs //
NK038(nyi)004:1788: srin mo'i tshogs te ma rungs pa //
NK038(nyi)004:1789: las su bza' dang bcad la dga' //
NK038(nyi)004:1790: dgra bo'i rus pa sha la mchod //
NK038(nyi)004:1791: dbang phyug chen po sku bskyod na //
NK038(nyi)004:1792: 'khor gyi ma sring ci la zhugs //
NK038(nyi)004:1793: dus la bab po sa ma ya //
NK038(nyi)004:1794: 'di la dam tshig ci mchis kyis //
NK038(nyi)004:1795: dbang phyug chen po kun gyi rje //
NK038(nyi)004:1796: bdud po chen po rdzu 'phrul can //
NK038(nyi)004:1797: kam ka tshig tshig dgra la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:1798: gdug pa'i mtshon cha dgra la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:1799: 'khor gyi pho nya dgra la ya //
NK038(nyi)004:1800: dam nyams bstod do sho ra re //
NK038(nyi)004:1801: dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka /
NK038(nyi)004:1802: srin mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyis //
NK038(nyi)004:1803: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
NK038(nyi)004:1804: rang dam srog snying dngos su phul //
NK038(nyi)004:1805: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar byas //
NK038(nyi)004:1806: sngon gyi dam tshig ji bzhin du //
NK038(nyi)004:1807: mthun pa'i dam rdzas bdag gi bsham //
NK038(nyi)004:1808: rnal 'byor dam can las gcig mchol //
NK038(nyi)004:1809: las bcol 'bras bu mchis par shog /
NK038(nyi)004:1810: sngon gyi tha tshig nyams pa re //
NK038(nyi)004:1811: dus la babs po sa ma ya //
NK038(nyi)004:1813: mar la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi mchod pa dbul lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1814: de nas lho nub gru gsum du brkos la nang nag por bya //
NK038(nyi)004:1817: dug la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams bzhag /
NK038(nyi)004:1821: mtshon skud sngo dmar gyi byad du gzhug /
NK038(nyi)004:1822: gul gyis bdug de nas yungs kar brdeg /
NK038(nyi)004:1823: rtags byung sa phur pa gdab /
NK038(nyi)004:1824: de nas hom khung du mtsher ma can gyi shing
NK038(nyi)004:1825: la me sbar la gang la bya ba'i ming byang
NK038(nyi)004:1826: re re dang / mar la sogs pa re re bsreg /
NK038(nyi)004:1827: bsnyen bsgrub gsum char gyis sngags gcig tu dril la /
NK038(nyi)004:1829: che ge mo ma ra ya phata /
NK038(nyi)004:1831: dug dang til la sogs pa rim pa kun rim pa bzhin du dbul lo //
NK038(nyi)004:1832: lid+ga gsum cha gcig phur pas gdab /
NK038(nyi)004:1833: gcig rtags byung byung du bcad gdab /
NK038(nyi)004:1834: gcig skye nas sngo dmar gyis btags la dkyil du sku la gtad /
NK038(nyi)004:1836: sku mchod khang du bzhugs su gsol //
NK038(nyi)004:1837: gzugs lam po che'i rgya gram du khyer la /
NK038(nyi)004:1838: dong gru gsum brus la nang nag por byug la der gzhug go //
NK038(nyi)004:1839: g.yam pa la sogs gtad khram du shes par bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1840: dur khrod bdag po bsgrub thabs rjogs so ////
NK038(nyi)004:1841: chos skyong srog mthud bsre ba zab pa bzhugs so //
NK038(nyi)004:1842: na mo gu ru bsgrub pa pos chos skyong rnams
NK038(nyi)004:1843: 'khor bar 'dod cing las gang sgo nyan pa'i thabs
NK038(nyi)004:1845: rang nus pa yod par byas la /
NK038(nyi)004:1847: 'khu ldog byed na srog bcing ba /
NK038(nyi)004:1848: gang 'gro sar khyi ltar 'khrid pa gnyis bstan na snga ma phyi ma la mi 'phreng pa /
NK038(nyi)004:1849: gnyis sgrub na rgod po ru sbrel ltar rtsal 'dren du bzhugs pa'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1851: rang yi dam gang byed khro bor bsgom /
NK038(nyi)004:1852: de'i snying khar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kha gyen du bstan par bsgom /
NK038(nyi)004:1853: de'i dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' tshon gang pa cig bsgom /
NK038(nyi)004:1854: de'i thugs kar pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi steng du rdo
NK038(nyi)004:1855: rje ljang ser rtse lnga gyen du langs pa gcig
NK038(nyi)004:1856: bsam / de'i lte ba la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du h'u nas rdog tsam gcig bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1857: h'u de'i 'og tu gdan khri'i tshul du rang gang
NK038(nyi)004:1858: bsgrub pa'i chos skyong bskyed pa'i sa bon de bsam
NK038(nyi)004:1859: / h+aum dang chos skyoong gi sa bon mtha' ma na /
NK038(nyi)004:1860: rang gi chos skyong gi sngags kyi mgo phyir bstan pas 'phred la bskor bar bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1861: de'i mtha' ma a dkar po mgo phyir bstan pas bskor bar bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1862: de ltar sems dpa' sum rtseg tu bsam pa'i mdun du chos skyong gang bsgrub pa de bskyed do //
NK038(nyi)004:1863: de nas sems dpa' gsum rtsegs dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1864: sa bon dang sngags las 'od zer 'phros pas rang
NK038(nyi)004:1865: gi sna bug g.yas nas thon te chos skyong gi
NK038(nyi)004:1866: g.yon nas gzhugs nas snying khar sa bon la thim
NK038(nyi)004:1867: pas / shin tu mnyes par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1868: chos skyong gi nus pa bsdus nas /
NK038(nyi)004:1869: g.yas nas thon rang gi sna bug g.yon du zhugs
NK038(nyi)004:1870: sa bon la thim pas nus pa dang ldan bar
NK038(nyi)004:1871: bsam / des ni rang nus pa dang ldan cing /
NK038(nyi)004:1872: chos skyong las la 'jug pa'i thabs shin tu zab bo /
NK038(nyi)004:1873: gnyis pa 'gyur ldog byed pa'i srog bcing ba ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1874: rang gi snying khar gong du bsam pa'i sngags kyi
NK038(nyi)004:1875: phyi ma +aa li k+aa li gnyis bsgrag gi bskor
NK038(nyi)004:1877: gsum pa khyi ltar khrid pa ni gong ltar bsam
NK038(nyi)004:1878: pa'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas rang gi
NK038(nyi)004:1879: g.yas nas thon / chos skyong gi g.yon nas zhugs
NK038(nyi)004:1880: nas de'i sa bon snying po snying khrag dang bcas
NK038(nyi)004:1881: g.yas nas thon / pas bsdus nas / 'od dmar ser song nas /
NK038(nyi)004:1882: chos skyong gi sna bug g.yas nas rang gi g.yon du zhugs pas /
NK038(nyi)004:1883: rang gi snying kha'i sa bon la /
NK038(nyi)004:1884: snying po dang bcas pa thim par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1885: de ltar byas pas rang gang 'gro sar khyi ltar khrid do //
NK038(nyi)004:1886: bzhi pa chos skyong snga mas phyi ma la phan na /
NK038(nyi)004:1887: rang snga ma bzhin du bsam te /
NK038(nyi)004:1888: mdun du chos skyong snga ma de bka' sdod kyi tshul du bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1889: phyi ma 'ang bdag dang snga ma de'i sa bon /
NK038(nyi)004:1890: sngags kyi mtha' ma phyi ma'i chos skyong gis sngags kyis bskor bar bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1891: rang gi sa bon las 'od 'phros sna bug g.yas nas thon /
NK038(nyi)004:1892: snga ma chos skyong gi g.yon du zhugs /
NK038(nyi)004:1894: snying khrag bsdus nas g.yas nas thon /
NK038(nyi)004:1895: bdag la phyag rten gyi tshul du phul bas thim par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1896: phyi ma'i chos la yang de ltar bya'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1897: de nas chos skyong phyi ma de 'doms por zhu /
NK038(nyi)004:1898: snga ma'i de la thim pas /
NK038(nyi)004:1899: snga ma yang 'dom phor zhu nas rang gi lte ba'i thad kar thim par bsam mo //
NK038(nyi)004:1900: de nas 'a khum ldog byed mi nus te /
NK038(nyi)004:1901: rang sha la rang mi za /
NK038(nyi)004:1902: rang khrag la rang mi 'thung pas gnyis su med par bsre ba'i man ngag go //
NK038(nyi)004:1903: snga ma chos skyong gnyis po rgod po ru sbrel ltar rtsal 'gran du bzhug pa ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1905: chos skyong snga ma de'i snying po la phyi ma'i snying pos bskor bar bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1906: snga ma'i rkang pa'i phyi ma'i mgo bo mnan par bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1907: 'od zer gyi spro bsdu sngar dang 'dra'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1908: des chos skyong gnyis po 'gran nas las byed do //
NK038(nyi)004:1909: yang spro bsdu'i dmigs pa ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1910: chos skyong dam can mdun du bsam /
NK038(nyi)004:1912: rang sha la rang mi za /
NK038(nyi)004:1913: rang khrag la rang gis mi 'thung bas ldog mi srin do //
NK038(nyi)004:1914: 'dis 'od zer thams cad dmar po yin /
NK038(nyi)004:1915: chos skyong bsgrub dus thun la 'jug pa dang /
NK038(nyi)004:1916: thun bar rnams dang thun 'jog khar dmigs pa rnams byed pa yin no //
NK038(nyi)004:1917: chos skyong gang sgrub kyang dmigs pa 'di bzhin byas pas /
NK038(nyi)004:1919: dmigs pa 'di med pas chos skyong bsgrub pa ni /
NK038(nyi)004:1920: rje dpon la zhu ba phul ba dang 'dra /
NK038(nyi)004:1921: gnad 'di yod na chos skyong bsgrub pa ni bka' 'og gi 'bangs dang 'dra'o //
NK038(nyi)004:1922: dmigs pa rnams lngas chos skyong las la bkol ba'i man ngag /
